chunk:
jazba-e-ishq salamat hai to insha-allah
kachche dhage se chale aaenge sarkar bandhe

ajib lutf kuchh aapas ki chheD-chhaD mein hai
kahan milap mein wo baat jo bigaD mein hai

na chheD ai nikhat-e-baad-e-bahaari rah lag apni
tujhe aTkheliyan sujhi hain hum be-zar baiThe hain

kya hansi aati hai mujh ko hazrat-e-insan par
fe'l-e-bad KHud hi karen la'nat karen shaitan par

kamar bandhe hue chalne ko yan sab yar baiThe hain
bahut aage gae baqi jo hain tayyar baiThe hain

pahunchun main kis ki kohna haqiqat ko aaj tak
'insha' mujhe mila nahin apna hi kuchh suragh

main ne jo kachkacha kar kal un ki ran kaTi
to un ne kis maze se meri zaban kaTi

ye ajib majra hai ki ba-roz-e-id-e-qurban
wahi zabh bhi kare hai wahi le sawab ulTa

kuchh ishaara jo kiya hum ne mulaqat ke waqt
Tal kar kahne lage din hai abhi raat ke waqt

ji ki ji hi mein rahi baat na hone pai
haif ki us se mulaqat na hone pai

laila o majnun ki lakhon garche taswiren khinchin
mil gai sab KHak mein jis waqt zanjiren khinchin

nazakat us gul-e-rana ki dekhiyo 'insha'
nasim-e-subh jo chhu jae rang ho maila

sanwle tan pe ghazab dhaj hai basanti shaal ki
ji mein hai kah baiThiye ab jai kanhayya lal ki

kar leta hun band aankhen main diwar se lag kar
baiThe hai kisi se jo koi pyar se lag kar

zamin se uTThi hai ya charKH par se utri hai
ye aag ishq ki ya-rab kidhar se utri hai

yaad kya aata hai wo mera lage jaana aur aah
pichhe haT kar us ka ye kahna koi aa jaega

hai KHal yun tumhaare chah-e-zaqan ke andar
jis rup ho kanhayya aab-e-jaman ke andar

kaTe hain hum ne yunhi ayyam zindagi ke
sidhe se sidhe-sade aur kaj se kaj rahe hain

na kah tu shaiKH mujhe zohd sikh masti chhoD
teri pasand juda hai meri pasand juda

phabti tere mukhDe pe mujhe hur ki sujhi
la hath idhar de ki bahut dur ki sujhi

dahki hai aag dil mein paDe ishtiyaq ki
tere siwae kis se ho is ka ilaj aaj

har taraf hain tere didar ke bhuke lakhon
peT bhar kar koi aisa bhi trahdar na ho

subh-dam mujh se lipaT kar wo nashe mein bole
tum bane baad-e-saba hum gul-e-nasrin hue

garmi ne kuchh aag aur bhi sine mein lagai
har taur gharaz aap se milna hi kam achchha

ghuncha-e-gul ke saba god bhari jati hai
ek pari aati hai aur ek pari jati hai

sanam-KHana jata hun tu mujh ko nahaq
na bahka na bahka na bahka na bahka

de ek shab ko apni mujhe zard shaal tu
hai mujh ko sunghne ke hawas so nikal tu

shaiKH-ji ye bayan karo hum bhi to bari kuchh sunen
aap ke hath kya laga KHalwat-o-etikaf mein

chand muddat ko firaq-e-sanam-o-dair to hai
aao kaba kabhi dekh aaen na ek sair to hai

jis ne yaro mujh se dawa sher ke fan ka kiya
main ne le kar us ke kaghaz aur qalam aage dhara

us sang-dil ke hijr mein chashmon ko apne aah
manind-e-abshaar kiya hum ne kya kiya

jawe wo sanam brij ko to aap kanhaiya
jhaT samne ho murli ki dhun nazr pakaD kar

hai nur-e-basar mardumak-e-dida mein pinhan yun jaise kanhaiya
so ashk ke qatron se paDa khele hai jhurmuT aur aankhon mein panghaT

baiThta hai jab tundila shaiKH aa kar bazm mein
ek baDa maTka sa rahta hai shikam aage dhara

KHayal kijiye kya kaam aaj main ne kiya
jab un ne di mujhe gali salam main ne kiya

har-chand ki aasi hun pa ummat mein hun us ki
jis ka hai qadam arsh-e-mualla se bhi baala

tu ne lagai ab ki ye kya aag ai basant
jis se ki dil ki aag uThe jag ai basant

KHuban-e-rozgar muqallid teri hain sab
jo chiz tu kare so wo pawe riwaj aaj

har shaKH zard o surKH o siyah hijr-e-yar mein
Daste hain dil ko aan ke jun nag ai basant

na lagi mujh ko jab us shoKH-e-trahdar ki gend
us ne mahram ko sambhaal aur hi tayyar ki gend

gar shaKH-e-zafaran use kahiye to hai rawa
hai farah-baKHsh waqai is had kohan basant

patte nahin chaman mein khaDakte tere baghair
karti hai is libas mein har-dam fughan basant

aate nazar hain dasht-o-jabal zard har taraf
hai ab ke sal aisi hai ai dostan basant

laga di daun is jangal ko bas ek do hi aahon mein
ye dharpat qahr kuchh insha ne dipak rag ka joDa

'insha' se shaiKH puchhta hai kya salah hai
targhib-e-baada di hai mujhe ai jawan basant

kafir sama raha hai sarang ka ye lahra
table ki tal-o-sam ke har har paran ke andar

hichkiyan le hai is tarah bat-e-mai
jis tarah gaTkari mein tan phire

aashiq ko dekhte hain dupaTTe ko tan kar
dete hain hum ko sharbat-e-didar chhan kar

tamam umr isi ehtiyat mein guzri
ki aashiyan kisi shaKH-e-chaman pe bar na ho

tamam umr jo ki hum se be-ruKHi sab ne
kafan mein hum bhi azizon se munh chhupa ke chale

ashk-e-gham dida-e-pur-nam se sambhaale na gae
ye wo bachche hain jo man bap se pale na gae

'anis' aasan nahin aabaad karna ghar mohabbat ka
ye un ka kaam hai jo zindagi barbaad karte hain

gul-dasta-e-maani ko nae Dhang se bandhun
ek phul ka mazmun ho to sau rang se bandhun

'anis' dam ka bharosa nahin Thahar jao
charagh le ke kahan samne hawa ke chale

garmi se muztarib tha zamana zamin par
bhun jata tha jo girta tha dana zamin par

laga raha hun mazamin-e-nau ke phir ambar
KHabar karo mere KHirman ke KHosha-chinon ko

siwae KHak ke baqi asar nishan se na the
zamin se dab gae dabte jo aasman se na the

KHak se hai KHak ko ulfat taDapta hun 'anis'
karbala ke waste main karbala mere liye

karim jo tujhe dena hai be-talab de de
faqir hun pa nahin aadat-e-sawal mujhe

misal-e-mahi-e-be-ab mauj taDpa ki
habab phuT ke roe jo tum naha ke chale

tu sarapa ajr ai zahid main sar-ta-pa gunah
bagh-e-jannat teri KHatir karbala mere liye

chhae phulon se bhi sayyaad to aabaad na ho
wo qafas kya jo tah-e-daman-esayyaad na ho

sada aish dauran dikhata nahin
gaya waqt phir hath aata nahin

dosti kis se na thi kis se mujhe pyar na tha
jab bure waqt pe dekha to koi yar na tha

jo koi aawe hai nazdik hi baiThe hai tere
hum kahan tak tere pahlu se sarakte jawen

aasan na samajhiyo tum naKHwat se pak hona
ek umr kho ke hum ne sikha hai KHak hona

aashna bewafa nahin hota
bewafa aashna nahin hota

aur kuchh tohfa na tha jo late hum tere niyaz
ek do aansu the aankhon mein so bhar laen hain hum

ghair ko tum na aankh bhar dekho
kya ghazab karte ho idhar dekho

hai yahi shauq shahadat ka agar dil mein to ishq
le hi pahunchega hamein bhi teri shamshir talak

jaan-o-dil hain udas se mere
uTh gaya kaun pas se mere

itne aansu to na the dida-e-tar ke aage
ab to pani hi bhara rahta hai ghar ke aage

izhaar-e-KHamoshi mein hai sau tarah ki fariyaad
zahir ka ye parda hai ki main kuchh nahin kahta

qismat ne dur aisa hi phenka hamein ki hum
phir jite-ji pahunch na sake apne yar tak

go bhale sab hain aur main hun bura
kya bhalon mein bura nahin hota

wasl hota hai jin ko duniya mein
yarab aise bhi log hote hain

hum ko bhi dushmani se tere kaam kuchh nahin
tujh ko agar hamare nahin pyar se gharaz

kyun in dinon 'hasan' tu itna jhaTak gaya hai
zalim kahin tera dil kya phir aTak gaya hai

Tuk dekh len chaman ko chalo lala-zar tak
kya jaane phir jien na jien hum bahaar tak

sar ko na phenk apne falak par ghurur se
tu KHak se bana hai tera ghar zamin hai

main ne jo kaha mujh pe kya kya na sitam guzra
bola ki abe tera rote hi janam guzra

duniya hai sambhal ke dil lagana
yan log ajab ajab milenge

ishq ka ab martaba pahuncha muqabil husn ke
ban gae but hum bhi aaKHir us sanam ki yaad mein

tu KHafa mujh se ho to ho lekin
main to tujh se KHafa nahin hota

furqat ki shab mein aaj ki phir kya jalawenge
dil ka diya tha ek so kal hi jala diya

mat ponchh abru-e-araq-alud hath se
lazim hai ehtiyat ki hai aab-dar tegh

na gharaz mujh ko hai kafir se na din-dar se kaam
roz-o-shab hai mujhe us kakul-e-KHamdar se kaam

is ko ummid nahin hai kabhi phir basne ke
aur viranon se is dil ka hai virana juda

jis tarah chaha likhin dil ne kaha yun mat likh
saikDon bar dhara aur uThaya kaghaz

main to is Dar se kuchh nahin kahta
tu mabaada udas ho jawe

shab-e-awwal to tawaqqo pe tere wade ke
sahal hoti hai bala hoti hai par aaKHir-e-shab

kar ke bismil na tu ne phir dekha
bas isi gham mein jaan di hum ne

naujawani ki did kar lije
apne mausam ki id kar lije

bas gaya jab se yar aankhon mein
tab se phuli bahaar aankhon mein

lagaya mohabbat ka jab yan shajar
shajar lag gaya aur samar jal gaya

tu raha dil mein dil raha tujh mein
tis pe tera milap ho na saka

main ne paya na ise shahr mein na sahra mein
tu ne le ja ke mere dil ko kahan chhoD diya

kucha-e-yar hai aur dair hai aur kaba hai
dekhiye ishq hamein aah kidhar lawega

jab se juda hua hai wo shoKH tab se mujh ko
nit aah aah karna aur zar zar rona

main bhi ek mani-e-pechida ajab tha ki 'hasan'
guftugu meri na pahunchi kabhi taqrir talak

dard karta hai tap-e-ishq ki shiddat se mera
sar juda sina juda qalb juda shana juda

us shoKH ke jaane se ajab haal hai mera
jaise koi bhule hue phirta hai kuchh apna

asar howe na howe par bala se ji to bahlega
nikala shaghl tanhai mein main na-chaar rone ka

mohabbat ka rasta ajab garm tha
qadam jab dhara KHak par jal gaya

KHwah kaba ho ki but-KHana gharaz hum se sun
jis taraf dil ki tabiat ho udhar ko chaliye

taki ibrat karen aur ghair na dekhen tujh ko
ji mein aata hai nikalwaiye do-chaar ki aankh

zulm kab tak kijiyega is dil-e-nashad par
ab to is bande pe Tuk kije karam banda-nawaz

guzri hai raat mujh mein aur dil mein turfa sohbat
idhar to main ne ki aah udhar se wo karaha

mat baKHt-e-KHufta par mere hans ai raqib tu
hoga tere nasib bhi ye KHwab dekhna

aah tazim ko uThti hai mere sine se
dil pe jab us ki nigahon ke KHadang aate hain

ek dam bhi mila na hum ko qarar
is dil-e-be-qarar ke hathon

jhuT-muT un se main kuchh maslahatan bolunga
sach hai tu bol na uThiyo dil-e-agah ki jhuT

nazuki us ke lab ki kya kahiye
pankhuDi ek gulab ki si hai

rah-e-dur-e-ishq mein rota hai kya
aage aage dekhiye hota hai kya

patta patta buTa buTa haal hamara jaane hai
jaane na jaane gul hi na jaane bagh to sara jaane hai

koi tum sa bhi kash tum ko mile
muddaa hum ko intiqam se hai

ab to jate hain but-kade se 'mir'
phir milenge agar KHuda laya

hum hue tum hue ki 'mir' hue
us ki zulfon ke sab asir hue

aag the ibtida-e-ishq mein hum
ab jo hain KHak intiha hai ye

ulTi ho gain sab tadbiren kuchh na dawa ne kaam kiya
dekha is bimari-e-dil ne aaKHir kaam tamam kiya

le sans bhi aahista ki nazuk hai bahut kaam
aafaq ki is kargah-e-shishagari ka

mat sahl hamein jaano phirta hai falak barson
tab KHak ke parde se insan nikalte hain

mir kya sade hain bimar hue jis ke sabab
usi attar ke laDke se dawa lete hain

yaad us ki itni KHub nahin 'mir' baz aa
nadan phir wo ji se bhulaya na jaega

bare duniya mein raho gham-zada ya shad raho
aisa kuchh kar ke chalo yan ki bahut yaad raho

phul gul shams o qamar sare hi the
par hamein un mein tumhin bhae bahut

phirte hain 'mir' KHwar koi puchhta nahin
is aashiqi mein izzat-e-sadat bhi gai

'mir' ke din-o-mazhab ko ab puchhte kya ho un ne to
qashqa khincha dair mein baiTha kab ka tark islam kiya

ishq ek 'mir' bhaari patthar hai
kab ye tujh na-tawan se uThta hai

sham se kuchh bujha sa rahta hun
dil hua hai charagh muflis ka

sirhane 'mir' ke koi na bolo
abhi Tuk rote rote so gaya hai

iqrar mein kahan hai inkar ki si KHubi
hota hai shauq ghaalib us ki nahin nahin par

hoga kisi diwar ke sae mein paDa 'mir'
kya rabt mohabbat se us aaram-talab ko

dil ki virani ka kya mazkur hai
ye nagar sau martaba luTa gaya

nahaq hum majburon par ye tohmat hai muKHtari ki
chahte hain so aap karen hain hum ko abas badnam kiya

kya kahun tum se main ki kya hai ishq
jaan ka rog hai bala hai ishq

rote phirte hain sari sari raat
ab yahi rozgar hai apna

be-KHudi le gai kahan hum ko
der se intizar hai apna

'mir' un nim-baz aankhon mein
sari masti sharab ki si hai

bewafai pe teri ji hai fida
qahr hota jo ba-wafa hota

'mir' sahab tum farishta ho to ho
aadmi hona to mushkil hai miyan

dikhai diye yun ki be-KHud kiya
hamein aap se bhi juda kar chale

'mir' amdan bhi koi marta hai
jaan hai to jahan hai pyare

gul ho mahtab ho aaina ho KHurshid ho mir
apna mahbub wahi hai jo ada rakhta ho

kya kahen kuchh kaha nahin jata
ab to chup bhi raha nahin jata

ab kar ke faramosh to nashad karoge
par hum jo na honge to bahut yaad karoge

dilli mein aaj bhik bhi milti nahin unhen
tha kal talak dimagh jinhen taj-o-taKHt ka

yahi jaana ki kuchh na jaana hae
so bhi ek umr mein hua malum

amir-zadon se dilli ke mil na ta-maqdur
ki hum faqir hue hain inhin ki daulat se

shart saliqa hai har ek amr mein
aib bhi karne ko hunar chahiye

us ke farogh-e-husn se jhamke hai sab mein nur
sham-e-haram ho ya ki diya somnat ka

hamare aage tera jab kisu ne nam liya
dil-e-sitam-zada ko hum ne tham tham liya

wasl mein rang uD gaya mera
kya judai ko munh dikhaunga

ishq mashuq ishq aashiq hai
yani apna hi mubtala hai ishq

mujh ko shaer na kaho 'mir' ki sahab main ne
dard o gham kitne kiye jama to diwan kiya

jae hai ji najat ke gham mein
aisi jannat gai jahannam mein

zaKHm jhele dagh bhi khae bahut
dil laga kar hum to pachhtae bahut

'mir' bandon se kaam kab nikla
mangna hai jo kuchh KHuda se mang

ab aaya dhyan ai aaram-e-jaan is na-muradi mein
kafan dena tumhein bhule the hum asbab-e-shadi mein

ishq mein ji ko sabr o tab kahan
us se aankhen laDin to KHwab kahan

kaha main ne kitna hai gul ka sabaat
kali ne ye sun kar tabassum kiya

mere saliqe se meri nibhi mohabbat mein
tamam umr main nakaamiyon se kaam liya

jab yar ne uTha kar zulfon ke baal bandhe
tab main ne apne dil mein lakhon KHayal bandhe

fikr-e-maash ishq-e-butan yaad-e-raftagan
is zindagi mein ab koi kya kya kiya kare

na kar 'sauda' tu shikwa hum se dil ki be-qarari ka
mohabbat kis ko deti hai miyan aaram duniya mein

kaifiyyat-e-chashm us ki mujhe yaad hai 'sauda'
saghar ko mere hath se lijo ki chala main

saqi gai bahaar rahi dil mein ye hawas
tu minnaton se jam de aur main kahun ki bas

'sauda' jo be-KHabar hai wahi yan kare hai aish
mushkil bahut hai un ko jo rakhte hain aagahi

'sauda' tu is ghazal ko ghazal-dar-ghazal hi kah
hona hai tujh ko 'mir' se ustad ki taraf

'sauda' jo tera haal hai itna to nahin wo
kya jaaniye tu ne use kis aan mein dekha

gila likhun main agar teri bewafai ka
lahu mein gharq safina ho aashnai ka

'sauda' ki jo baalin pe gaya shor-e-qayamat
KHuddam-e-adab bole abhi aankh lagi hai

jis roz kisi aur pe bedad karoge
ye yaad rahe hum ko bahut yaad karoge

kaun kisi ka gham khata hai
kahne ko gham-KHwar hai duniya

main ne tum ko dil diya aur tum ne mujhe ruswa kiya
main ne tum se kya kiya aur tum ne mujh se kya kiya

'sauda' KHuda ke waste kar qissa muKHtasar
apni to nind uD gai tere fasane mein

tera KHat aane se dil ko mere aaram kya hoga
KHuda jaane ki is aaghaz ka anjam kya hoga

samjhe the hum jo dost tujhe ai miyan ghalat
tera nahin hai jurm hamara guman ghalat

we suraten ilahi kis mulk bastiyan hain
ab dekhne ko jin ke aankhen tarastiyan hain

gul phenke hai auron ki taraf balki samar bhi
ai KHana-bar-andaz-e-chaman kuchh to idhar bhi

ye to nahin kahta hun ki sach-much karo insaf
jhuTi bhi tasalli ho to jita hi rahun main

har sang mein sharar hai tere zuhur ka
musa nahin jo sair karun koh tur ka

dil ke TukDon ko baghal-gir liye phirta hun
kuchh ilaj is ka bhi ai shisha-giran hai ki nahin

na jiya teri chashm ka mara
na teri zulf ka bandha chhuTa

kahiyo saba salam hamara bahaar se
hum to chaman ko chhoD ke su-e-qafas chale

ishq se to nahin hun main waqif
dil ko shoala sa kuchh lipaTta hai

gar ho sharab o KHalwat o mahbub-e-KHub-ru
zahid qasam hai tujh ko jo tu ho to kya kare

gar tujh mein hai wafa to jafakar kaun hai
dil-dar tu hua to dil-azar kaun hai

ammame ko utar ke paDhiyo namaz shaiKH
sajde se warna sar ko uThaya na jaega

'sauda' jahan mein aa ke koi kuchh na le gaya
jata hun ek main dil-e-pur-arzu liye

'sauda' hue jab aashiq kya pas aabru ka
sunta hai ai diwane jab dil diya to phir kya

akela ho rah-e-duniya mein gir chahe bahut jina
hui hai faiz-e-tanhai se umr-e-KHizr tulani

dikhaunga tujhe zahid us aafat-e-din ko
KHalal dimagh mein tere hai parsai ka

kis munh se phir tu aap ko kahta hai ishq-baz
ai ru-siyah tujh se to ye bhi na ho saka

badla tere sitam ka koi tujh se kya kare
apna hi tu farefta howe KHuda kare

zahid sabhi hain neamat-e-haq jo hai akl-o-shurb
lekin ajab maza hai sharab o kabab ka

kya zid hai mere sath KHuda jaane wagarna
kafi hai tasalli ko meri ek nazar bhi

tanha tere matam mein nahin sham-e-siyah-posh
rahta hai sada chaak gareban-e-sahar bhi

gharaz kufr se kuchh na din se hai matlab
tamasha-e-dair-o-haram dekhte hain

dil mat Tapak nazar se ki paya na jaega
jun ashk phir zamin se uThaya na jaega

yaro wo sharm se jo na bola to kya hua
aankhon mein sau tarah ki hikayat ho gai

hai muddaton se KHana-e-zanjir be-sada
malum hi nahin ki diwane kidhar gae

ye ranjish mein hum ko hai be-iKHtiyari
tujhe teri kha kar qasam dekhte hain

firaq-e-KHuld se gandum hai sina-chaak ab tak
ilahi ho na watan se koi gharib juda

tum kan dhar suno na suno us ke harf ko
'sauda' ko haigi apni hi guftar se gharaz

abas tu ghar basata hai meri aankhon mein ai pyare
kisi ne aaj tak dekha bhi hai pani pe ghar Thahra

'sauda' teri fariyaad se aankhon mein kaTi raat
aai hai sahar hone ko tuk tu kahin mar bhi

mat puchh ye ki raat kaTi kyunke tujh baghair
is guftugu se faeda pyare guzar gai

kya karunga le ke waiz hath se huron ke jam
hun main saghar-kash kisi ke saghar-e-maKHmur ka

baadshahat do jahan ki bhi jo howe mujh ko
tere kuche ki gadai se na kho de mujh ko

har aan aa mujhi ko satate ho naseho
samjha ke tum use bhi to yak-bar kuchh kaho

be-sabaati zamane ki na-chaar
karni mujh ko bayan paDti hai

'mushafi' hum to ye samjhe the ki hoga koi zaKHm
tere dil mein to bahut kaam rafu ka nikla

log kahte hain mohabbat mein asar hota hai
kaun se shahr mein hota hai kidhar hota hai

tere kuche har bahane mujhe din se raat karna
kabhi is se baat karna kabhi us se baat karna

baal apne baDhate hain kis waste diwane
kya shahr-e-mohabbat mein hajjam nahin hota

eid ab ke bhi gai yunhi kisi ne na kaha
ki tere yar ko hum tujh se mila dete hain

wadon hi pe har roz meri jaan na Talo
hai eid ka din ab to gale hum ko laga lo

chheD mat har dam na aaina dikha
apni surat se KHafa baiThe hain hum

ai 'mushafi' tu in se mohabbat na kijiyo
zalim ghazab hi hoti hain ye dilli waliyan

dekh kar hum ko na parde mein tu chhup jaya kar
hum to apne hain miyan ghair se sharmaya kar

jo mila us ne bewafai ki
kuchh ajab rang hai zamane ka

hairan hun is qadar ki shab-e-wasl bhi mujhe
tu samne hai aur tera intizar hai

eid tu aa ke mere ji ko jalawe afsos

ho na diwana to hai aql se insan KHali

adam se dahr mein aana kise gawara tha
kashan kashan mujhe lai hai aarzu teri

masnad-e-shahi ki hasrat hum faqiron ko nahin
farsh hai ghar mein hamare chadar-e-mahtab ka

us gul-badan ki bu-e-badan kuchh na puchhiye
band-e-qaba jo khol diye ghar mahak gaya

bayan KHwab ki tarah jo kar raha hai
ye qissa hai jab ka ki 'atish' jawan tha

aaj tak apni jagah dil mein nahin apne hui
yar ke dil mein bhala puchho to ghar kyun-kar karen

shagird tarz-e-KHanda-zani mein hai gul tera
ustad-e-andalib hain soz-o-fughan mein hum

libas-e-kaba ka hasil kiya sharaf us ne
jo ku-e-yar mein kali koi ghaTa aai

aasar-e-ishq aankhon se hone lage ayan
bedari ki taraqqi hui KHwab kam hua

chupke chupke raat din aansu bahana yaad hai
hum ko ab tak aashiqi ka wo zamana yaad hai

nahin aati to yaad un ki mahinon tak nahin aati
magar jab yaad aate hain to aksar yaad aate hain

chori chori hum se tum aa kar mile the jis jagah
muddaten guzrin par ab tak wo Thikana yaad hai

aarzu teri barqarar rahe
dil ka kya hai raha raha na raha

wafa tujh se ai bewafa chahta hun
meri sadgi dekh kya chahta hun

teri mahfil se uThata ghair mujh ko kya majal
dekhta tha main ki tu ne bhi ishaara kar diya

aaine mein wo dekh rahe the bahaar-e-husn
aaya mera KHayal to sharma ke rah gae

hum kya karen agar na teri aarzu karen
duniya mein aur bhi koi tere siwa hai kya

barsat ke aate hi tauba na rahi baqi
baadal jo nazar aae badli meri niyat bhi

KHirad ka nam junun paD gaya junun ka KHirad
jo chahe aap ka husn-e-karishma-saz kare

iqrar hai ki dil se tumhein chahte hain hum
kuchh is gunah ki bhi saza hai tumhaare pas

kaT gai ehtiyat-e-ishq mein umr
hum se izhaar-e-muddaa na hua

dopahar ki dhup mein mere bulane ke liye
wo tera koThe pe nange panw aana yaad hai

kahne ko to main bhul gaya hun magar ai yar
hai KHana-e-dil mein teri taswir abhi tak

aise bigDe ki phir jafa bhi na ki
dushmani ka bhi haq ada na hua

dekhne aae the wo apni mohabbat ka asar
kahne ko ye hai ki aae hain ayaadat kar ke

raushan jamal-e-yar se hai anjuman tamam
dahka hua hai aatish-e-gul se chaman tamam

sher dar-asl hain wahi 'hasrat'
sunte hi dil mein jo utar jaen

aap ko aata raha mere satane ka KHayal
sulh se achchhi rahi mujh ko laDai aap ki

aur to pas mere hijr mein kya rakkha hai
ek tere dard ko pahlu mein chhupa rakkha hai

waqif hain KHub aap ke tarz-e-jafa se hum
izhaar-e-iltifat ki zahmat na kijiye

malum sab hai puchhte ho phir bhi muddaa
ab tum se dil ki baat kahen kya zaban se hum

'hasrat' ki bhi qubul ho mathura mein haziri
sunte hain aashiqon pe tumhaara karam hai aaj

barq ko abr ke daman mein chhupa dekha hai
hum ne us shoKH ko majbur-e-haya dekha hai

jabin par sadgi nichi nigahen baat mein narmi
muKHatib kaun kar sakta hai tum ko lafz-e-qatil se

hai mashq-e-suKHan jari chakki ki mashaqqat bhi
ek turfa tamasha hai 'hasrat' ki tabiat bhi

chhup nahin sakti chhupane se mohabbat ki nazar
paD hi jati hai ruKH-e-yar pe hasrat ki nazar

khinch lena wo mera parde ka kona dafatan
aur dupaTTe se tera wo munh chhupana yaad hai

phir aur taghaful ka sabab kya hai KHudaya
main yaad na aaun unhen mumkin hi nahin hai

gham-e-arzu ka 'hasrat' sabab aur kya bataun
meri himmaton ki pasti mere shauq ki bulandi

allah-ri jism-e-yar ki KHubi ki KHud-ba-KHud
ranginiyon mein Dub gaya pairahan tamam

haqiqat khul gai 'hasrat' tere tark-e-mohabbat ki
tujhe to ab wo pahle se bhi baDh kar yaad aate hain

kahan hum kahan wasl-e-jaanan ki 'hasrat'
bahut hai unhen ek nazar dekh lena

jo aur kuchh ho teri did ke siwa manzur
to mujh pe KHwahish-e-jannat haram ho jae

hai intiha-e-yas bhi ek ibtida-e-shauq
phir aa gae wahin pe chale the jahan se hum

ghair ki nazron se bach kar sab ki marzi ke KHilaf
wo tera chori-chhupe raaton ko aana yaad hai

sher mere bhi hain pur-dard wa-lekin 'hasrat'
'mir' ka shewa-e-guftar kahan se laun

milte hain is ada se ki goya KHafa nahin
kya aap ki nigah se hum aashna nahin

mera ishq bhi KHud-gharaz ho chala hai
tere husn ko bewafa kahte kahte

kabhi ki thi jo ab wafa kijiyega
mujhe puchh kar aap kya kijiyega

us na-KHuda ke zulm o sitam hae kya karun
kashti meri Duboi hai sahil ke aas-pas

manus ho chala tha tasalli se haal-e-dil
phir tu ne yaad aa ke ba-dastur kar diya

mujh ko dekho mere marne ki tamanna dekho
phir bhi hai tum ko masihai ka dawa dekho

bad-guman aap hain kyun aap se shikwa hai kise
jo shikayat hai hamein gardish-e-ayyam se hai

shikwa-e-gham tere huzur kiya
hum ne be-shak baDa qusur kiya

sabhi kuchh ho chuka un ka hamara kya raha 'hasrat'
na din apna na dil apna na jaan apni na tan apna

guzre bahut ustad magar rang-e-asar mein
be-misl hai 'hasrat' suKHan-e-'mir' abhi tak

paigham-e-hayat-e-jawedan tha
har naghma-e-krishn bansuri ka

wasl ki banti hain in baaton se tadbiren kahin
aarzuon se phira karti hain taqdiren kahin

munhasir waqt-e-muqarrar pe mulaqat hui
aaj ye aap ki jaanib se nai baat hui

tum se bichhaD kar zinda hain
jaan bahut sharminda hain

miTTi ki mohabbat mein hum aashufta-saron ne
wo qarz utare hain ki wajib bhi nahin the

KHwab ki tarah bikhar jaane ko ji chahta hai
aisi tanhai ki mar jaane ko ji chahta hai

dil pagal hai roz nai nadani karta hai
aag mein aag milata hai phir pani karta hai

dua ko hat uThate hue larazta hun
kabhi dua nahin mangi thi man ke hote hue

KHud ko bikharte dekhte hain kuchh kar nahin pate hain
phir bhi log KHudaon jaisi baaten karte hain

mere KHuda mujhe itna to mo'tabar kar de
main jis makan mein rahta hun us ko ghar kar de

beTiyan bap ki aankhon mein chhupe KHwab ko pahchanti hain
aur koi dusra is KHwab ko paDh le to bura manti hain

ye waqt kis ki raunat pe KHak Dal gaya
ye kaun bol raha tha KHuda ke lahje mein

zamana ho gaya KHud se mujhe laDte-jhagaDte
main apne aap se ab sulh karna chahta hun

ek charagh aur ek kitab aur ek ummid asasa
us ke baad to jo kuchh hai wo sab afsana hai

duaen yaad kara di gai thin bachpan mein
so zaKHm khate rahe aur dua diye gae hum

azab ye bhi kisi aur par nahin aaya
ki ek umr chale aur ghar nahin aaya

ghar ki wahshat se larazta hun magar jaane kyun
sham hoti hai to ghar jaane ko ji chahta hai

samundaron ko bhi hairat hui ki Dubte waqt
kisi ko hum ne madad ke liye pukara nahin

wafa ki KHair manata hun bewafai mein bhi
main us ki qaid mein hun qaid se rihai mein bhi

ras aane lagi duniya to kaha dil ne ki ja
ab tujhe dard ki daulat nahin milne wali

wahi firaq ki baaten wahi hikayat-e-wasl
nai kitab ka ek ek waraq purana tha

tamam KHana-ba-doshon mein mushtarak hai ye baat
sab apne apne gharon ko palaT ke dekhte hain

payambaron se zaminen wafa nahin kartin
hum aise kaun KHuda the ki apne ghar rahte

main zindagi ki dua mangne laga hun bahut
jo ho sake to duaon ko be-asar kar de

sitaron se bhara ye aasman kaisa lagega
hamare baad tum ko ye jahan kaisa lagega

wahi charagh bujha jis ki lau qayamat thi
usi pe zarb paDi jo shajar purana tha

koi to phul khilae dua ke lahje mein
ajab tarah ki ghuTan hai hawa ke lahje mein

dil kabhi KHwab ke pichhe kabhi duniya ki taraf
ek ne ajr diya ek ne ujrat nahin di

wo kya manzil jahan se raste aage nikal jaen
so ab phir ek safar ka silsila karna paDega

buland hathon mein zanjir Dal dete hain
ajib rasm chali hai dua na mange koi

ek KHwab hi to tha jo faramosh ho gaya
ek yaad hi to thi jo bhula di gai to kya

shikam ki aag liye phir rahi hai shahr-ba-shahr
sag-e-zamana hain hum kya hamari hijrat kya

ghar se nikle hue beTon ka muqaddar malum
man ke qadmon mein bhi jannat nahin milne wali

karen to kis se karen na-rasaiyon ka gila
safar tamam hua ham-safar nahin aaya

bahut mushkil zamanon mein bhi hum ahl-e-mohabbat
wafa par ishq ki buniyaad rakhna chahte hain

hum apne raftagan ko yaad rakhna chahte hain
dilon ko dard se aabaad rakhna chahte hain

jawab aae na aae sawal uTha to sahi
phir is sawal mein pahlu nae sawal ke rakh

hum bhi ek sham bahut uljhe hue the KHud mein
ek sham us ko bhi haalat ne mohlat nahin di

hamin mein rahte hain wo log bhi ki jin ke sabab
zamin buland hui aasman ke hote hue

dayar-e-nur mein tira-shabon ka sathi ho
koi to ho jo meri wahshaton ka sathi ho

roz ek taza qasida nai tashbib ke sath
rizq bar-haq hai ye KHidmat nahin hogi hum se

main chup raha ki wazahat se baat baDh jati
hazar shewa-e-husn-e-bayan ke hote hue

umid-o-bim ke mehwar se haT ke dekhte hain
zara si der ko duniya se kaT ke dekhte hain

ye moajaza bhi kisi ki dua ka lagta hai
ye shahr ab bhi usi be-wafa ka lagta hai

hami bhi na the munkir-e-'ghaalib' bhi nahin the
hum ahl-e-tazabzub kisi jaanib bhi nahin the

duniya badal rahi hai zamane ke sath sath
ab roz roz dekhne wala kahan se laen

kahin kahin se kuchh misre ek-adh ghazal kuchh sher
is punji par kitna shor macha sakta tha main

samajh rahe hain magar bolne ka yara nahin
jo hum se mil ke bichhaD jae wo hamara nahin

wo hum nahin the to phir kaun tha sar-e-bazar
jo kah raha tha ki bikna hamein gawara nahin

KHak mein daulat-e-pindar-o-ana milti hai
apni miTTi se bichhaDne ki saza milti hai

ye bastiyan hain ki maqtal dua kiye jaen
dua ke din hain musalsal dua kiye jaen

hua hai yun bhi ki ek umr apne ghar na gae
ye jaante the koi rah dekhta hoga

main us se jhuT bhi bolun to mujh se sach bole
mere mizaj ke sab mausamon ka sathi ho

zindagi zinda-dili ka hai nam
murda-dil KHak jiya karte hain

teri surat se kisi ki nahin milti surat
hum jahan mein teri taswir liye phirte hain

wo nahin bhulta jahan jaun
hae main kya karun kahan jaun

siyah-baKHti mein kab koi kisi ka sath deta hai
ki tariki mein saya bhi juda rahta hai insan se

justuju karni har ek amr mein nadani hai
jo ki peshani pe likkhi hai wo pesh aani hai

dariya-e-husn aur bhi do hath baDh gaya
angDai us ne nashshe mein li jab uTha ke hath

KHud ghalat hai jo kahe hoti hai taqdir ghalat
kahin qismat ki bhi ho sakti hai tahrir ghalat

rashk se nam nahin lete ki sun le na koi
dil hi dil mein use hum yaad kiya karte hain

mashuqon se ummid-e-wafa rakhte ho 'nasiKH'
nadan koi duniya mein nahin tum se ziyaada

tamam umr yun hi ho gai basar apni
shab-e-firaq gai roz-e-intizar aaya

ghair se kheli hai holi yar ne
Dale mujh par dida-e-KHun-bar rang

tin tribeni hain do aankhen meri
ab allahabad bhi punjab hai

shubh 'nasiKH' nahin kuchh 'mir' ki ustadi mein
aap be-bahra hai jo mo'taqid-e-'mir' nahin

zulfon mein kiya qaid na abru se kiya qatl
tu ne to koi baat na mani mere dil ki

lete lete karwaTen tujh bin jo ghabraata hun main
nam le le kar tera raaton ko chillata hun main

ai ajal ek din aaKHir tujhe aana hai wale
aaj aati shab-e-furqat mein to ehsan hota

hum mai-kashon ko Dar nahin marne ka mohtasib
firdaus mein bhi sunte hain nahr-e-sharab hai

ab ki holi mein raha be-kar rang
aur hi laya firaq-e-yar rang

kis tarah chhoDun yakayak teri zulfon ka KHayal
ek muddat ke ye kale nag hain pale hue

jis qadar hum se tum hue nazdik
us qadar dur kar diya hum ko

gaya wo chhoD kar raste mein mujh ko
ab us ka naqsh-e-pa hai aur main hun

furqat-e-yar mein insan hun main ya ki sahab
har baras aa ke rula jati hai barsat mujhe

bhulta hi nahin wo dil se use
hum ne sau sau tarah bhula dekha

kaam auron ke jari rahen nakaam rahen hum
ab aap ki sarkar mein kya kaam hamara

KHwab hi mein nazar aa jae shab-e-hijr kahin
so mujhe hasrat-e-didar ne sone na diya

kaam kya nikle kisi tadbir se
aadmi majbur hai taqdir se

ho gaya zard paDi jis pe hasinon ki nazar
ye ajab gul hain ki tasir-e-KHizan rakhte hain

wo nazar aata hai mujh ko main nazar aata nahin
KHub karta hun andhere mein nazare raat ko

kis ki holi jashn-e-nau-rozi hai aaj
surKH mai se saqiya dastar rang

karti hai mujhe qatl mere yar ki talwar
talwar ki talwar hai raftar ki raftar

aati jati hai ja-ba-ja badli
saqiya jald aa hawa badli

dil siyah hai baal hain sab apne piri mein safed
ghar ke andar hai andhera aur bahar chandni

go tu milta nahin par dil ke taqaze se hum
roz ho aate hain sau bar tere kuche mein

furqat qubul rashk ke sadme nahin qubul
kya aaen hum raqib teri anjuman mein hai

ain danai hai 'nasiKH' ishq mein diwangi
aap saudai hain jo kahte hain saudai mujhe

rifat kabhi kisi ki gawara yahan nahin
jis sar-zamin ke hum hain wahan aasman nahin

raat din naqus kahte hain ba-awaz-e-buland
dair se behtar hai kaba gar buton mein tu nahin

munh aap ko dikha nahin sakta hai sharm se
is waste hai piTh idhar aaftab ki

dekh kar tujh ko qadam uTh nahin sakta apna
ban gae surat-e-diwar tere kuche mein

jism aisa ghul gaya hai mujh mariz-e-ishq ka
dekh kar kahte hain sab tawiz hai bazu nahin

takallum hi faqat hai us sanam ka
KHuda ki tarah goya be-dahan hai

ba-zer-e-qasr-e-gardun kya koi aaram se soe
ye chhat aisi purani hai ki shabnam se Tapakti hai

tang aa jab jab kaha main ne ki mar jaun kahin
bad-guman samjha ki is ko ishtiyaq-e-hur hai

tazgi hai suKHan-e-kuhna mein ye baad-e-wafat
log aksar mere jine ka guman rakhte hain

hir-phir ke daere hi mein rakhta hun main qadam
aai kahan se gardish-e-parkar panw mein

hum zaifon ko kahan aamad o shud ki taqat
aankh ki band hua kucha-e-jaanan paida

kare jo har qadam par ek nala
zamane mein dira hai aur main hun

bahut fareb se hum wahshiyon ko wahshat hai
hamare dasht mein 'nasiKH' kahin sarab nahin

baad murdan bhi hai tera KHauf mujh ko is qadar
aankh uTha kar main ne jannat mein na dekha hur ko

sanam kucha tera hai aur main hun
ye zindan-e-dagha hai aur main hun

uTho ye manzar-e-shab-tab dekhne ke liye
ki nind shart nahin KHwab dekhne ke liye

badan mein jaise lahu taziyana ho gaya hai
use gale se lagae zamana ho gaya hai

raat ko jit to pata nahin lekin ye charagh
kam se kam raat ka nuqsan bahut karta hai

tum parindon se ziyaada to nahin ho aazad
sham hone ko hai ab ghar ki taraf lauT chalo

hoshiyari dil-e-nadan bahut karta hai
ranj kam sahta hai elan bahut karta hai

badan ke donon kinaron se jal raha hun main
ki chhu raha hun tujhe aur pighal raha hun main

sar agar sar hai to nezon se shikayat kaisi
dil agar dil hai to dariya se baDa hona hai

sham-e-KHema koi zanjir nahin ham-safaran
jis ko jaana hai chala jae ijazat kaisi

hum to raat ka matlab samjhen KHwab, sitare, chand, charagh
aage ka ahwal wo jaane jis ne raat guzari ho

jo kuchh hua wo kaise hua jaanta hun main
jo kuchh nahin hua wo bata kyun nahin hua

ret par thak ke gira hun to hawa puchhti hai
aap is dasht mein kyun aae the wahshat ke baghair

hamein to KHair bikharna hi tha kabhi na kabhi
hawa-e-taza ka jhonka bahana ho gaya hai

tum suno ya na suno hath baDhao na baDhao
Dubte Dubte ek bar pukarenge tumhein

ajab harif tha mere hi sath Dub gaya
mere safine ko gharqab dekhne ke liye

sarhaden achchhi ki sarhad pe na rukna achchha
sochiye aadmi achchha ki parinda achchha

ek laDka shahr ki raunaq mein sab kuchh bhul jae
ek buDhiya roz chaukhaT par diya raushan kare

apne kis kaam mein laega batata bhi nahin
hum ko auron pe ganwana bhi nahin chahta hai

us ki aankhen hain ki ek Dubne wala insan
dusre Dubne wale ko pukare jaise

tum se mile to KHud se ziyaada
tum ko akela paya hum ne

mere hone mein kisi taur se shamil ho jao
tum masiha nahin hote ho to qatil ho jao

main chahta hun yahin sare faisle ho jaen
ki is ke baad ye duniya kahan se launga main

hum ne dekha hi tha duniya ko abhi us ke baghair
lijiye bich mein phir dida-e-tar aa gae hain

ruh ko ruh se milne nahin deta hai badan
KHair ye bich ki diwar gira chahti hai

kaha tha tum ne ki lata hai kaun ishq ki tab
so hum jawab tumhaare sawal hi ke to hain

shoala-e-ishq bujhana bhi nahin chahta hai
wo magar KHud ko jalana bhi nahin chahta hai

hum sab aaina-dar-aina-dar-aina hain
kya KHabar kaun kahan kis ki taraf dekhta hai

hamare dil ko ek aazar hai aisa nahin lagta
ki hum daftar bhi jate hain ghazal-KHwani bhi karte hain

ab aa gai hai sahar apna ghar sambhaalne ko
chalun ki jaga hua raat bhar ka main bhi hun

jaane kya Than ke uThta hun nikalne ke liye
jaane kya soch ke darwaze se lauT aata hun

magar giraft mein aata nahin badan us ka
KHayal DhunDhta rahta hai istiara koi

wo jo ek shart thi wahshat ki uTha di gai kya
meri basti kisi sahra mein basa di gai kya

us ko manzur nahin hai meri gumrahi bhi
aur mujhe rah pe lana bhi nahin chahta hai

nafrat ke KHazane mein to kuchh bhi nahin baqi
thoDa sa guzare ke liye pyar bachaen

aaKHir-e-shab hui aaghaz kahani apni
hum ne paya bhi to ek umr ganwa kar us ko

hawa-e-kufa-e-na-mehrban ko hairat hai
ki log KHema-e-sabr-o-raza mein zinda hain

rup ki dhup kahan jati hai malum nahin
sham kis tarah utar aati hai ruKHsaron par

sab ko nishana karte karte
KHud ko mar giraya hum ne

uDe to phir na milenge rafaqaton ke parind
shikayaton se bhari Tahniyan na chhu lena

jaan hum kar-e-mohabbat ka sila chahte the
dil-e-sada koi mazdur hai ujrat kaisi

main jhapaTne ke liye DhunDh raha hun mauqa
aur wo shoKH samajhta hai ki sharmata hun

hum to sahra hue jate the ki us ne aa kar
shahr aabaad kiya nahr-e-saba jari ki

hum ne muddat se ulaT rakkha hai kasa apna
dast-e-dadar tere dirham-o-dinar pe KHak

kuchh ishq ke nisab mein kamzor hum bhi hain
kuchh parcha-e-sawal bhi aasan chahiye

aaj tak un ki KHudai se hai inkar mujhe
main to ek umr se kafir hun sanam jaante hain

ajnabi jaan ke kya nam-o-nishan puchhte ho
bhai hum bhi usi basti ke nikale hue hain

ek main hun ki is aashob-e-nawa mein chup hun
warna duniya mere zaKHmon ki zaban bolti hai

ai parindo yaad karti hai tumhein pagal hawa
roz ek nauha sar-e-shaKH shajar sunta hun main

main teri manzil-e-jaan tak pahunch to sakta hun
magar ye rah badan ki taraf se aati hai

udas KHushk labon par laraz raha hoga
wo ek bosa jo ab tak meri jabin pe nahin

ajab nahin ki ye dariya nazar ka dhoka ho
ajab nahin ki koi rasta nikal aae

us zulf pe phabti shab-e-dijur ki sujhi
andhe ko andhere mein baDi dur ki sujhi

ilahi kya ilaqa hai wo jab leta hai angDai
mere sine mein sab zaKHmon ke Tanke TuT jate hain

mil gae the ek bar us ke jo mere lab se lab
'umr bhar honTon pe apne main zaban phera kiya

hai aashiq o mashuq mein ye farq ki mahbub
taswir-e-tafarruj hai wo putla hai alam ka

kaifiyat mahfil-e-KHuban ki na us bin puchho
us ko dekhun na to phir de mujhe dikhlai kya

hain lazim-o-malzum baham husn o mohabbat
hum hote na talib jo wo matlub na hota

ahwal kya bayan main karun hae ai tabib
hai dard us jagah ki jahan ka nahin ilaj

bhari jo hasrat-o-yas apni guftugu mein hai
KHuda hi jaane ki banda kis aarzu mein hai

sabhi inam nit pate hain ai shirin-dahan tujh se

zar diya zor diya mal diya ganj diye

dekh pachhtaega o but mere tarsane se

kaleja kanpta hai dekh kar is sard-mehri ko
tumhaare ghar mein kya aae ki hum kashmir mein aae

itni to did-e-ishq ki tasir dekhiye
jis samt dekhiye teri taswir dekhiye

kaba banaiye ki kalisa banaiye
dil sa makan hawale kiya hai janab ke

hain wo sufi jo kabhi nala-e-naqus suna
wajd karne lage hum dil ka ajab haal hua

hua dhup mein bhi na kam husn-e-yar
kanhayya bana wo jo sanwla gaya

roz o shab furqat-e-jaanan mein basar ki hum ne
tujh se kuchh kaam na ai gardish-e-dauran nikla

sakin-e-dair hun ek but ka hun banda ba-KHuda
KHud wo kafir hain jo kahte hain musalman mujh ko

na paDha yar ne ahwal-e-shikasta mera
KHat ke purze kiye bazu-e-kabutar toDa

aashiq hain hum ko harf-e-mohabbat se kaam hai
mulla nikalta phire matlab kitab se

tumhaari zulf na girdab-e-naf tak pahunchi
hui na chashma-e-haiwan se faiz-yab ghaTa

hum rind-e-pareshan hain mah-e-ramazan hai
chamki hui in rozon mein waiz ki dukan hai

kabe ki samt sajda kiya dil ko chhoD kar
to kis taraf tha dhyan hamara kidhar gaya

mai pi ke id kijiye guzra mah-e-siyam
tasbih rakhiye saghar-o-mina uThaiye

saf qulqul se sada aati hai aamin aamin
apne saqi ko jo hum rind dua dete hain

ulfat-e-kucha-e-jaanan ne kiya KHana-KHarab
barhaman dair se kabe se musalman nikla

majnun nahin ki ek hi laila ke ho rahen
rahta hai apne sath naya ek nigar roz

paya hai is qadar suKHan-e-saKHt ne riwaj
punjabi baat karte hain pashtu zaban mein

KHak mein mujh ko mila ke wo sanam kahta hai
apne allah se ja kar meri fariyaad karo

aap ko ghair bahut dekhte hain
ek din dekhiye pachhtaiyega

KHud-raftagi hai chashm-e-haqiqat jo wa hui
darwaza khul gaya to main ghar se nikal gaya

donon chashmon se mari ashk baha karte hain
maujzan rahta hai dariya ke kinare dariya

jab main rota hun to allah re hansna un ka
qahqahon mein mere nalon ko uDa dete hain

tu apne panw ki mehndi chhuDa ke de ai mahr
falak ko chahiye ghaza ruKH-e-qamar ke liye

mere ashaar se mazmun-e-ruKH-e-yar khula
be-ahadis nahin matlab-e-quran nikla

dasht-e-junun mein aa gain aankhen jo un ki yaad
bhaga mein KHak Dal ke chashm-e-ghazal mein

fasl-e-gul hi zahidon ko gham hi mai-kash shad hain
masjiden suni paDi hain bhTTiyan aabaad hain

hum bhi zarur kahte kisi kaam ke liye
fursat na aasman ko mili apne kaam se

dekhiye aaj wo tashrif kahan farmaen
hum se wada hai juda ghair se iqrar juda

kya banaya hai buton ne mujh ko
nam rakkha hai musalman mera

chashm wa rah gai dekha jo tilismat-e-jahan
aaina ban gae hum mahw-e-tamasha ho kar

chaar unsur ke sab tamashe hain
wah ye chaar bagh kis ka hai

uTha di qaid-e-mazhab dil se hum ne
qafas se tair-e-idrak nikla

kudurat nahin apni tab-e-rawan mein
bahut saf bahta hai dariya hamara

yaad-e-mizhgan mein meri aankh lagi jati hai
log sach kahte hain suli pe bhi nind aati hai

nahin hai hajiyon ko mai-kashi ki kaifiyyat
gae haram ko to hogi bahut KHarab ghaTa

tair-e-aql ko mazur kaha zahid ne
par-e-parwaz mein tasbih ka Dora bandha

saqiya ab ke baDe zoron pe hain hum mai-parast
chal ke waiz ko sar-e-mimbar lataDa chahiye

ai saba qila-e-hasti se jo dam ghabraya
baDh ke do-chaar qadam maut ka aaga bandha

jab us be-mehr ko ai jazb-e-dil kuchh josh aata hai
mah-e-nau ki tarah khole hue aaghosh aata hai

musibat ka pahaD aaKHir kisi din kaT hi jaega
mujhe sar mar kar teshe se mar jaana nahin aata

kashish-e-lucknow are tauba
phir wahi hum wahi aminabaad

gunah gin ke main kyun apne dil ko chhoTa karun
suna hai tere karam ka koi hisab nahin

sabr karna saKHt mushkil hai taDapna sahl hai
apne bas ka kaam kar leta hun aasan dekh kar

dard ho to dawa bhi mumkin hai
wahm ki kya dawa kare koi

pahaD kaTne wale zamin se haar gae
isi zamin mein dariya samae hain kya kya

ilm kya ilm ki haqiqat kya
jaisi jis ke guman mein aai

sab tere siwa kafir aaKHir is ka matlab kya
sar phira de insan ka aisa KHabt-e-mazhab kya

KHudi ka nashsha chaDha aap mein raha na gaya
KHuda bane the 'yagana' magar bana na gaya

kisi ke ho raho achchhi nahin ye aazadi
kisi ki zulf se lazim hai silsila dil ka

maut mangi thi KHudai to nahin mangi thi
le dua kar chuke ab tark-e-dua karte hain

sharbat ka ghunT jaan ke pita hun KHun-e-dil
gham khate khate munh ka maza tak bigaD gaya

jaise dozaKH ki hawa kha ke abhi aaya ho
kis qadar waiz-e-makkar Daraata hai mujhe

nai zamin naya aasman nai duniya
ajib shai ye tilism KHayal hota hai

waiz ki aankhen khul gain pite hi saqiya
ye jam-e-mai tha ya koi dariya-e-nur tha

diwana-war dauD ke koi lipaT na jae
aankhon mein aankhen Dal ke dekha na kijiye

kyun kisi se wafa kare koi
dil na mane to kya kare koi

KHuda hi jaane 'yagana' main kaun hun kya hun
KHud apni zat pe shak dil mein aae hain kya kya

mujhe dil ki KHata par 'yas' sharmana nahin aata
paraya jurm apne nam likhwana nahin aata

wahi saqi wahi saghar wahi shisha wahi baada
magar lazim nahin har ek par yaksan asar hona

buton ko dekh ke sab ne KHuda ko pahchana
KHuda ke ghar to koi banda-e-KHuda na gaya

pukarta raha kis kis ko Dubne wala
KHuda the itne magar koi aaDe aa na gaya

muflisi mein mizaj shahana
kis maraz ki dawa kare koi

be-dhaDak pichhle pahar nala-o-shewan na karen
kah de itna to koi taza-giraftaron se

pahunchi yahan bhi shaiKH o barhaman ki kashmakash
ab mai-kada bhi sair ke qabil nahin raha

jhankne takne ka waqt gaya
ab wo hum hain na wo zamana hai

kaba nahin ki sari KHudai ko daKHl ho
dil mein siwae yar kisi ka guzar nahin

parda-e-hijr wahi hasti-e-mauhum thi 'yas'
sach hai pahle nahin malum tha ye raaz mujhe

dur se dekhne ka 'yas' gunahgar hun main
aashna tak na hue lab kabhi paimane se

aa rahi hai ye sada kan mein viranon se
kal ki hai baat ki aabaad the diwanon se

mujhe ai naKHuda aaKHir kisi ko munh dikhana hai
bahana kar ke tanha par utar jaana nahin aata

KHuda jaane ajal ko pahle kis par rahm aaega
giraftar-e-qafas par ya giraftar-e-nasheman par

ghaalib aur mirza 'yagana' ka
aaj kya faisla kare koi

baz aa sahil pe ghote khane wale baz aa
Dub marne ka maza dariya-e-be-sahil mein hai

payam-e-zer-e-lab aisa ki kuchh suna na gaya
ishaara pate hi angDai li raha na gaya

kar-gah-e-duniya ki nesti bhi hasti hai
ek taraf ujaDti hai ek samt basti hai

saqi main dekhta hun zamin aasman ka farq
arsh-e-barin mein aur tere aastane mein

marte dam tak teri talwar ka dam bharte rahe
haq ada ho na saka phir bhi wafadaron se

dair o haram bhi Dhah gae jab dil nahin raha
sab dekhte hi dekhte virana ho gaya

duniya ke sath din ki begar al-aman
insan aadmi na hua jaanwar hua

farda ko dur hi se hamara salam hai
dil apna sham hi se charagh-e-sahar hua

rang badla phir hawa ka mai-kashon ke din phire
phir chali baad-e-saba phir mai-kade ka dar khula

na sang-e-mil na naqsh-e-qadam na bang-e-jaras
bhaTak na jaen musafir adam ki manzil ke

'yagana' wahi fateh-e-lakhknau hain
dil-e-sang-o-ahan mein ghar karne wale

KHuda malum is aaghaz ka anjam kya hoga
chhiDa hai saz-e-hasti mubtada-e-be-KHabar ho kar

zamana KHuda ko KHuda jaanta hai
yahi jaanta hai to kya jaanta hai

yaksan kabhi kisi ki na guzri zamane mein
yaadash-ba-KHair baiThe the kal aashiyane mein

duniya se 'yas' jaane ko ji chahta nahin
allah re husn gulshan-e-na-paedar ka

husn-e-zati bhi chhupae se kahin chhupta hai
sat pardon se ayan shahid-e-mani hoga

'yas' is charKH-e-zamana-saz ka kya e'tibar
mehrban hai aaj kal na-mehrban ho jaega

apni haalat ka KHud ehsas nahin hai mujh ko
main ne auron se suna hai ki pareshan hun main

kahte hain ki ummid pe jita hai zamana
wo kya kare jis ko koi ummid nahin ho

sabr par dil ko to aamada kiya hai lekin
hosh uD jate hain ab bhi teri aawaz ke sath

ishq paband-e-wafa hai na ki paband-e-rusum
sar jhukane ko nahin kahte hain sajda karna

betab sa phirta hai kai roz se 'asi'
bechaare ne phir tum ko kahin dekh liya hai

jahan apna qissa sunana paDa
wahin hum ko rona rulana paDa

murattab kar gaya ek ishq ka qanun duniya mein
wo diwane hain jo majnun ko diwana batate hain

jis ki ada ada pe ho insaniyat ko naz
mil jae kash aisa bashar DhunDte hain hum

jamhuriyat ka dars agar chahte hain aap
koi bhi saya-dar shajar dekh lijiye

main jin ko apna kahta hun kab wo mere kaam aate hain
ye sara sansar hai sapna sab jhuTe rishte-nate hain

sitam ye hai wo kabhi bhul kar nahin aaya
tamam umr raha jis ka intizar mujhe

ho bijliyon ka mujh se jahan par muqabla
ya-rab wahin chaman mein mujhe aashiyana de

mahw-e-hairat hun KHarash-e-dast-e-gham ko dekh kar
zaKHm chehre par hain ya hai aaina TuTa hua

ek hum hain hum ne kashti Dal di gardab mein
ek tum ho Darte ho aate hue sahil ke pas

muntazir hun main kafan bandh ke sar se 'ajiz'
samne se koi KHanjar nahin aaya ab tak

insan hadsat se kitna qarib hai
tu bhi zara nikal ke kabhi apne ghar se dekh

hasraten aa aa ke jama ho rahi hain dil ke pas
karwan goya pahunchne wala hai manzil ke pas

aaghaz-e-mohabbat mein 'ajiz' rukti na thi mauj-e-ashk-e-rawan
anjam ab in KHushk aankhon se ek ashk nikalna mushkil hai

hota hai mahsus ye 'ajiz' shayad us ne dastak di
tez hawa ke jhonke jab darwaze se Takraate hain

jin hauslon se mera junun mutmain na tha
wo hausle zamane ke meyar ho gae

ye dushmani hai saqi ya dosti hai saqi
auron ko jam dena mujh ko dikha dikha ke

guftugu ke KHatm ho jaane par aaya ye KHayal
jo zaban tak aa nahin paya wahi to dil mein tha

lazzat-e-dard mili ishrat-e-ehsas mili
kaun kahta hai hum us bazm se nakaam aae

aish hi aish hai na sab gham hai
zindagi ek hasin sangam hai

ab dard mein wo kaifiyat-e-dard nahin hai
aaya hun jo us bazm-e-gul-afshan se guzar ke

dil ka lahu nigah se Tapka hai bar-ha
hum rah-e-gham mein aisi bhi manzil se aae hain

shauq-e-manzil ham-safar hai jazba-e-dil rahbar
mujh pe KHud bhi khul nahin pata kidhar jata hun main

dayar-e-sajda mein taqlid ka riwaj bhi hai
jahan jhuki hai jabin un ka naqsh-e-pa to nahin

hijr ki raat ye har Dubte tare ne kaha
hum na kahte the na aaenge wo aae to nahin

hum ahl-e-dil ne meayar-e-mohabbat bhi badal Dale
jo gham har fard ka gham hai usi ko gham samajhte hain

mere hath suljha hi lenge kisi din
abhi zulf-e-hasti mein KHam hai to kya gham

jab chheDti hain un ko gumnam aarzuen
wo mujh ko dekhte hain meri nazar bacha ke

dil mein jo dard hai wo nigahon se hai ayan
ye baat aur hai na kahen kuchh zaban se hum

ek tumhaari yaad ne lakh diye jalae hain
aamad-e-shab ke qabl bhi KHatm-e-sahar ke baad bhi

nazzara-e-jamal ki fursat kahan mili
pahli nazar nazar ki hadon se guzar gai

monis-e-shab rafiq-e-tanhai
dard-e-dil bhi kisi se kam to nahin

hain wajud-e-shai mein pinhan azal o abad ke rishte
yahan kuchh nahin do roza koi shai nahin hai fani

jab kabhi dekha hai ai 'zaidi' nigah-e-ghaur se
har haqiqat mein mile hain chand afsane mujhe

aankhon mein liye jalwa-e-nairang-e-tamasha
aai hai KHizan jashn-e-bahaaran se guzar ke

ghazab hua ki in aankhon mein ashk bhar aae
nigah-e-yas se kuchh aur kaam lena tha

ghair puchhen bhi to hum kya apna afsana kahen
ab to hum wo hain jise apne bhi begana kahen

pi to lun aankhon mein umDe hue aansu lekin
dil pe qabu bhi to ho zabt ka yara bhi to ho

ab na wo shorish-e-raftar na wo josh-e-junun
hum kahan phans gae yaran-e-subuk-gam ke sath

haar ke bhi nahin miTi dil se KHalish hayat ki
kitne nizam miT gae jashn-e-zafar ke baad bhi

dikha di main ne wo manzil jo in donon ke aage hai
pareshan hain ki aaKHir ab kahen kya kufr o din mujh se

muddaton se KHalish jo thi jaise wo kam si ho chali
aaj mere sawal ka mil hi gaya jawab kya

kis tarah 'amanat' na rahun gham se main dil-gir
aankhon mein phira karti hai ustad ki surat

bosa aankhon ka jo manga to wo hans kar bole
dekh lo dur se khane ke ye baadam nahin

ji chahta hai sane-e-qudrat pe hun nisar
but ko biTha ke samne yaad-e-KHuda karun

gali ke siwa hath bhi chalta hai ab un ka
har roz nai hoti hai bedad ki surat

ghar mere shab ko jo wo rashk-e-qamar aa nikla
ho gae partaw-e-ruKH se dar o diwar safed

kis qadar dil se faramosh kiya aashiq ko
na kabhi aap ko bhule se bhi main yaad aaya

mahshar ka kiya wada yan shakl na dikhlai
iqrar ise kahte hain inkar ise kahte hain

chuTkiyan dil mein mere lene laga naKHun-e-ishq
gul-badan dekh ke us gul ka badan yaad aaya

wahm hi wahm mein apni hui auqat basar
kamar-e-yar ko bhule to dahan yaad aaya

daman pe loTne lage gir gir ke tifl-e-ashk
roe firaq mein to dil apna bahal gaya

sanwle tan pe qaba hai jo tere bhaari hai
lala kahta hai chaman mein ki ye 'girdhaari' hai

rawan dawan nahin yan ashk chashm-e-tar ki tarah
girah mein rakhte hain hum aabru guhar ki tarah

hai lutf hasinon ki do-rangi ka 'amanat'
do chaar gulabi hon to do chaar basanti

hangam-e-wasl radd-o-badal mujh se hai abas
niklega kuchh na kaam nahin aur han se aaj

sarw ko dekh ke kahta hai dil-e-basta-e-zulf
hum giraftar hain is bagh mein aazad hain sab

zindagi ek sawal hai jis ka jawab maut hai
maut bhi ek sawal hai jis ka jawab kuchh nahin

kahani apni apni ahl-e-mahfil jab sunate hain
mujhe bhi yaad ek bhula hua afsana aata hai

zamin par hain wo kuchh miTTi ke putle
ki jin mein rifaten hain aasman ki

mukammal dastan ka iKHtisar itna hi kafi hai
sulaya shor-e-duniya ne jagaya shor-e-mahshar ne

zaban o dahan se jo khulte nahin hain
wo khul jate hain raaz aksar nazar se

tumhaari bazm bhi kya bazm hai aadab hain kaise
wahi maqbul hota hai jo gustaKHana aata hai

zamane ki kashakash ka diya paiham pata mujh ko
kahin TuTe hue dil ne kahin TuTe hue sar ne

ya to andaz hi duniya ka badal de ya-rab
ya wo dil de ke ye andaz gawara ho jae

rone wale tujhe rone ka saliqa hi nahin
ashk pine ke liye hain ki bahane ke liye

wo kaun hain jinhen tauba ki mil gai fursat
hamein gunah bhi karne ko zindagi kam hai

nizam-e-mai-kada saqi badalne ki zarurat hai
hazaron hain safen jin mein na mai aai na jam aaya

sar-e-mahshar yahi puchhunga KHuda se pahle
tu ne roka bhi tha bande ko KHata se pahle

ab aur is ke siwa chahte ho kya 'mulla'
ye kam hai us ne tumhein muskura ke dekh liya

hum ne bhi ki thin koshishen hum na tumhein bhula sake
koi kami hamin mein thi yaad tumhein na aa sake

ishq karta hai to phir ishq ki tauhin na kar
ya to behosh na ho, ho to na phir hosh mein aa

'mulla' bana diya hai ise bhi mahaz-e-jang
ek sulh ka payam thi urdu zaban kabhi

mujhe kar ke chup koi kahta hai hans kar
unhen baat karne ki aadat nahin hai

jis ke KHayal mein hun gum us ko bhi kuchh KHayal hai
mere liye yahi sawal sab se baDa sawal hai

nazar jis ki taraf kar ke nigahen pher lete ho
qayamat tak phir us dil ki pareshani nahin jati

ishq mein wo bhi ek waqt hai jab
be-gunahi gunah hai pyare

had-e-takmil ko pahunchi teri ranai-e-husn
jo kasar thi wo miTa di teri angDai ne

main faqat insan hun hindu musalman kuchh nahin
mere dil ke dard mein tafriq-e-iman kuchh nahin

kahne ko lafz do hain ummid aur hasrat
in mein nihan magar ek duniya ki dastan hai

tum jis ko samajhte ho ki hai husn tumhaara
mujh ko to wo apni hi mohabbat nazar aai

aaina-e-rangin jigar kuchh bhi nahin kya
kya husn hi sab kuchh hai nazar kuchh bhi nahin kya

us ek nazar ke bazm mein qisse bane hazar
utna samajh saka jise jitna shuur tha

gham-e-hayat sharik-e-gham-e-mohabbat hai
mila diye hain kuchh aansu meri sharab ke sath

husn ke jalwe nahin muhtaj-e-chashm-e-arzu
shama jalti hai ijazat le ke parwane se kya

ek ek lamhe mein jab sadiyon ki sadiyan kaT gain
aisi kuchh raaten bhi guzri hain meri tere baghair

dil-e-betab ka andaz-e-bayan hai warna
shukr mein kaun si shai hai jo shikayat mein nahin

ab ban ke falak-zad dikhate hain hamein aankh
zarre wahi kal jin ko uchhaala tha hamin ne

tu ne pheri lakh narmi se nazar
dil ke aaine mein baal aa hi gaya

KHun-e-jigar ke qatre aur ashk ban ke Tapken
kis kaam ke liye the kis kaam aa rahe hain

teri jafa ko jafa main to kah nahin sakta
sitam sitam hi nahin hai jo dil ko ras aae

aql ke bhaTke houn ko rah dikhlate hue
hum ne kaTi zindagi diwana kahlate hue

dayar-e-ishq hai ye zarf-e-dil ki jaanch hoti hai
yahan poshak se andaza insan ka nahin hota

KHuda jaane dua thi ya shikayat lab pe bismil ke
nazar su-e-falak thi hath mein daman-e-qatil tha

mohabbat farq kho deti hai aala aur adna ka
ruKH-e-KHurshid mein zarre ki hum tanwir dekhenge

na jaane kitni shamen gul huin kitne bujhe tare
tab ek KHurshid itraata hua baala-e-baam aaya

muKHtasar apni hadis-e-zist ye hai ishq mein
pahle thoDa sa hanse phir umr bhar roya kiye

gale laga ke kiya nazr-e-shoala-e-atish
qafas se chhuT ke phir aashiyan mile na mile

shama ek mom ke paikar ke siwa kuchh bhi na thi
aag jab tan mein lagai hai to jaan aai hai

ashk-e-gham-e-ulfat mein ek raaz-e-nihani hai
pi jao to amrit hai bah jae to pani hai

farq jo kuchh hai wo mutrib mein hai aur saz mein hai
warna naghma wahi har parda-e-awaz mein hai

har ek surat pe dhoka kha rahi hain teri surat ka
abhi aata nahin nazron ko ta-hadd-e-nazar jaana

is pe hairan hain KHaridar ki qimat hai bahut
mere gauhar ki tab-o-tab nahin dekhte hain

ye KHana hamesha se viran hai
kahan koi dil ke makan mein raha

dekha hai kisi aahu-e-KHush-chashm ko us ne
aankhon mein bahut us ki chamak aai hui hai

hum tere aasman mein ai harf-e-e'tibar
uDna to chahte hain magar par kahan se laen

kyun nahin hote munajaton ke mani munkashif
ramz ban jata hai kyun harf-e-dua hum se suno

dastak pe ab gharon se koi bolta nahin
pahle ye shahr shahr-e-'adam-raftagan na tha

na mere hath se chhuTna hai mere neze ko
na tere tir ko teri kaman mein rahna hai

us ki muTThi mein jawahir the nazar meri taraf
aur mujhe pairaya-e-arz-e-hunar aata na tha

jo sa'at-e-numud wahi waqt-e-raft-o-bud
dariya mein kitni der safar hai hubab ka

jauhar baghair qimat-e-aina kuchh nahin
aaina le bhi aaen to jauhar kahan se laen

har taraf gahri siyahi hai muhit-e-'ishq mein
ek sham'-e-dil ke bujhne se dhuan kitna hua

to kya hua jo gala ye rasan mein rahne laga
maza to dana-e-haq ka dahan mein rahne laga

wo jald aaenge ya der mein KHuda jaane
main gul bichhaun ki kaliyan bichhaun bistar par

is ada se mujhe salam kiya
ek hi aan mein ghulam kiya

milte hi nazar dil ko milaya nahin jata
aaghaz ko anjam banaya nahin jata

hum ishq ke bande hain mazhab se nahin waqif
gar kaba hua to kya but-KHana hua to kya

ye na aane ke bahane hain sabhi warna miyan

kahta hai bahut kuchh wo mujhe chupke hi chupke

faeda kya hai nasihat se phire ho naseh

phaba hai ruKH pe tere KHush-numa sanam lekin

ya Dar mujhe tera hai ki main kuchh nahin kahta

koi manzil nahin baqi hai musafir ke liye

aag si lag rahi hai sine mein

sare dil ek se nahin hote

ahmiyat ka mujhe apni bhi to andaza hai

ek muddat se KHayalon mein basa hai jo shaKHs

shiw to nahin hum phir bhi hum ne duniya bhar ke zahr piye
itni kaDwahaT hai munh mein kaise miThi baat karen

main ne ye soch ke boe nahin KHwabon ke daraKHt

mere haalat ne yun kar diya patthar mujh ko

charagh ban ke jali thi main jis ki mahfil mein

hum aise surma hain laD ke jab haalat se palTe
to baDh ke zindagi ne pesh kin baisakhiyan hum ko

main jab bhi us ki udasi se ub jaungi

zindagi ke sare mausam aa ke ruKHsat ho gae

hum ne sara jiwan banTi pyar ki daulat logon mein
hum hi sara jiwan tarse pyar ki pai pai ko

ye hausla bhi kisi roz kar ke dekhungi
agar main zaKHm hun us ka to bhar ke dekhungi

kuredta hai bahut rakh mere mazi ki

hamari bebasi shahron ki diwaron pe chipki hai
hamein DhunDegi kal duniya purane ishtihaaron mein

meri taswir banane ko jo hath uThta hai

hum ne sab ko muflis pa ke toD diya dil ka kashkol

tamam umr kisi aur nam se mujh ko
pukarta raha ek ajnabi zaban mein wo

jin ko diwar-o-dar bhi Dhak na sake
is qadar be-libas hain kuchh log

kahne wala KHud to sar takiye pe rakh kar so gaya
meri be-chaari kahani raat bhar roti rahi

hamein di jaegi phansi hamare apne jismon mein
ujaDi hain tamannaon ki lakhon bastiyan hum ne

main raushni hun to meri pahunch kahan tak hai

wo ye kah kah ke jalata tha hamesha mujh ko

main apne jism mein rahti hun is takalluf se
ki jaise aur kisi dusre ke ghar mein hun

main bhi sahil ki tarah TuT ke bah jati hun
jab sada de ke bulata hai samundar mujh ko

main kis zaban mein us ko kahan talash karun
jo meri gunj ka lafzon se tarjuma kar de

shahr KHwabon ka sulagta raha aur shahr ke log
be-KHabar soe hue apne makanon mein mile

hum se ziyaada kaun samajhta hai gham ki gahrai ko
hum ne KHwabon ki miTTi se paTa hai is khai ko

dhup meri sari rangini uDa le jaegi
sham tak main dastan se waqia ho jaungi

chaman pe bas na chala warna ye chaman wale
hawaen bechte nilam rang-o-bu karte

apni hasti ka kuchh ehsas to ho jae mujhe
aur nahin kuchh to koi mar hi Dale mujh ko

main us ki dhup hun jo mera aaftab nahin
ye baat KHud pe main kis tarah aashkar karun

mere andar ek dastak si kahin hoti rahi
zindagi oDhe hue main be-KHabar soti rahi

aaina-KHane mein khinche liye jata hai mujhe
kaun meri hi adalat mein bulata hai mujhe

jaane kitne raaz khulen jis din chehron ki rakh dhule

waqt hakim hai kisi roz dila hi dega

hum hain ehsas ke sailab-zada sahil par
dekhiye hum ko kahan le ke kinara jae

charaghon ne hamare sae lambe kar diye itne

is ghar ke chappe chappe par chhap hai rahne wale ki

us ki har baat samajh kar bhi main anjaan rahi

umr bhar raste ghere rahe us shaKHs ka ghar

ajab si aag thi jalta raha badan sara

ai dil ki KHalish chal yunhi sahi chalta to hun un ki mahfil mein

wafaon ke badle jafa kar rahe hain
main kya kar raha hun wo kya kar rahe hain

aata hai jo tufan aane de kashti ka KHuda KHud hafiz hai

ai jazba-e-dil gar main chahun har chiz muqabil aa jae

main DhunDh raha hun meri wo shama kahan hai
jo bazm ki har chiz ko parwana bana de

hum bhi KHud ko tabah kar lete
tum idhar bhi nigah kar lete

KHamoshiyon ne meri un se kuchh kalam kiya

ishq ka ejaz sajdon mein nihan rakhta hun main

'bahzad' saf saf main kahta hun haal-e-dil

ai dekhne walo mujhe hans hans ke na dekho

ghar se nikal kar jata hun main roz kahan

ek jaise lag rahe hain ab sabhi chehre mujhe

is tarah to aur bhi diwangi baDh jaegi
pagalon ko pagalon se dur rahna chahiye

har taraf thi KHamoshi aur aisi KHamoshi
raat apne sae se hum bhi Dar ke roe the

hum kafiron ne shauq mein roza to rakh liya
ab hausla baDhane ko iftar bhi to ho

bas zara ek aaine ke TuTne ki der thi

yaad bhi aata nahin kuchh bhulta bhi kuchh nahin

sabab KHamoshiyon ka main nahin tha
mere ghar mein sabhi kam bolte the

kitna aasan tha bachpan mein sulana hum ko
nind aa jati thi pariyon ki kahani sun kar

jaane kitne log shamil the meri taKHliq mein

har ghaDi tera tasawwur har nafas tera KHayal

hamare haal pe ab chhoD de hamein duniya

hamari baat kisi ki samajh mein kyun aati
KHud apni baat ko kitna samajh rahe hain hum

us ko bhi meri tarah apni wafa par tha yaqin

ab to itni bar hum raste mein Thokar kha chuke

itna to samajhte the hum bhi us ki majburi

aankhon mein ek bar ubharne ki der thi

kahin jaise main koi chiz rakh kar bhul jata hun

main thoDi der bhi aankhon ko apni band kar lun to
andheron mein mujhe ek raushni mahsus hoti hai

daman ke chaak sine ko baiThe hain jab bhi hum

ummidon se parda rakkha KHushiyon se mahrum rahin
KHwab mara to chaalis din tak sog manaya aankhon ne

tum ek bar mein gharqab kyun nahin hote

warna to hum manzar aur pas-manzar mein uljhe rahte

suraj se us ka nam-o-nasab puchhta tha main
utra nahin hai raat ka nashsha abhi talak

main ne mana ek guhar hun phir bhi sadaf mein hun
mujh ko aaKHir yun hi ghuT kar kab tak rahna hai

hum sarabon mein hue daKHil to ye hum par khula

ye iltija dua ye tamanna fuzul hai
sukhi nadi ke pas samundar na jaega

KHuda ke waste mohr-e-sukut toD bhi de

ab dilon mein koi gunjaish nahin milti 'hayat'

muddaa hum apna kaghaz par raqam kar jaenge

har sada se bach ke wo ehsas-e-tanhai mein hai

meri dastan bhi ajib hai wo qadam qadam mere sath tha

jam-e-ishq pi chuke zindagi bhi ji chuke

na hi bijliyan na hi barishen na hi dushmanon ki wo sazishen

jab waqt paDa tha to jo kuchh hum ne kiya tha

aaj phir dab gain dard ki siskiyan

bahar jo nahin tha to koi baat nahin thi

pahle bhi jahan par bichhDe the wahi manzil thi is bar magar
wo bhi be-laus nahin lauTa hum bhi be-tab nahin aae

is aql ki mari nagri mein kabhi pani aag nahin banta

jawab is sawal ka bhi de zara mujhe
uDa ke lai hai yahan pe kyun hawa mujhe

ishq ki choT ka kuchh dil pe asar ho to sahi

shab ko mai KHub si pi subh ko tauba kar li
rind ke rind rahe hath se jannat na gai

main ne puchha ki hai kya shaghl to hans kar bole

ek raat dil-jalon ko ye aish-e-visal de
phir chahe aasman jahannam mein Dal de

jis ne kuchh ehsan kiya ek bojh sar par rakh diya

na ho barham jo bosa be-ijazat le liya main ne

qumqumon ki tarah qahqahe jal bujhe

main to ghazal suna ke akela khaDa raha

aaina ye to batata hai ki main kya hun magar

itne hisson mein baT gaya hun main
mere hisse mein kuchh bacha hi nahin

zindagi se baDi saza hi nahin

sach ghaTe ya baDhe to sach na rahe

kaisi ajib shart hai didar ke liye

chahe sone ke frame mein jaD do

main jis ke hath mein ek phul de ke aaya tha
usi ke hath ka patthar meri talash mein hai

tishnagi ke bhi maqamat hain kya kya yani

hawas ne toD di barson ki sadhna meri

miTe ye shubh to a dost tujh se baat karen

kyun aaina kahen use patthar na kyun kahen

ek taraf qanun hai aur ek taraf insan hai

aisa na ho gunah ki daldal mein ja phansun

zindagi se baDi saza hi nahin
aur kya jurm hai pata hi nahin

jaise an-dekhe ujale ki koi diwar ho
band ho jata hai kuchh duri pe har ek rasta

mausam hain do hi ishq ke surat koi bhi ho

nigah-e-naz ki pahli si barhami bhi gai
main dosti ko hi rota tha dushmani bhi gai

yaad aur un ki yaad ki allah-re mahwiyat

mohabbat aur 'mail' jald-bazi kya qayamat hai

nazar aur wusat-e-nazar malum
itni mahdud kaenat nahin

dawa-e-insaniyat 'mail' abhi zeba nahin

main ne dekhe hain dahakte hue phulon ke jigar

sailab-e-ishq gharq-kun-e-aql-o-hosh tha

dekhoge to har moD pe mil jaengi lashen

had se guzra jab intizar tera

tumhein hanste hue dekha hai jab se

hae kya chiz thi jawani bhi

duniya ka KHun daur-e-mohabbat mein hai safed

kabhi jannat kabhi dozaKH kabhi kaba kabhi dair

be-piye waiz ko meri rae mein

ab chaman mein bhi kisi surat se ji lagta nahin

KHumar-aluda aankhen raat-bhar ki

phenki na 'munawar' ne buzurgon ki nishani

dahliz pe rakh di hain kisi shaKHs ne aankhen

taDapti dekhta hun jab koi shai

naseh KHata muaf sunen kya bahaar mein

hum ne pala muddaton pahlu mein hum koi nahin

dimagh de jo KHuda gulshan-e-mohabbat mein

dil-lagi mein hasrat-e-dil kuchh nikal jati to hai

jaane de sabr o qarar o hosh ko
