dastan-e-shauq-e-dil aisi nahin thi muKHtasar
ji laga kar tum agar sunte main kahta aur bhi

KHali sahi bala se tasalli to dil ko ho
rahne do samne mere saghar sharab ka

kya KHabar mujh ko KHizan kya chiz hai kaisi bahaar
aankhen kholin aa ke main ne KHana-e-sayyaad mein

ahd ke baad liye bose dahan ke itne
ki lab-e-zud-pashiman ko mukarne na diya

kijiye aisa jahan paida jahan koi na ho
zarra-o-aKHtar zamin-o-asman koi na ho

fikr hai shauq-e-kamar ishq-e-dahan paida karun
chahta hun ek dil mein do makan paida karun

bas ki thi rone ki aadat wasl mein bhi yar se
kah ke apna aap haal-e-arzu rone laga

dil dhaDakta hai shab-e-gham mein kahin aisa na ho
marg bhi ban kar mizaj-e-yar tarsae mujhe

waqt-e-rawa-rawi hai uThe qafila ke log
saqi chale piyala jahan tak ki bas chale

umr bhar rashk-e-adu sath tha kahta kya haal
wo mila bhi kabhi tanha to main tanha na hua

gar yahi hai pas-e-adab-e-sukut
kis tarah fariyaad lab tak aaegi

zamane se nirala hai urus-e-fikr ka jauban
jawan hoti hai ai 'taslim' jab ye pir hoti hai

guftugu ki tum se aadat ho gai hai warna mein
jaanta hun baat karti hai kahin taswir bhi

wahshiyon ko qaid se chhuTe hue muddat hui
gunjta hai shor ab tak kan mein zanjir ka

fikr-e-maal thi na gham-e-rozgar tha
hum the jahan mein aur tera intizar tha

tum aise be-KHabar bhi shaz honge is zamane mein
ki dil mein rah ke andaza nahin hai dil ki haalat ka

dekhna hai kis mein achchhi shakl aati hai nazar
us ne rakkha hai mere dal ke barabar aaina

fana hone mein soz-e-shama ki minnat-kashi kaisi
jale jo aag mein apni use parwana kahte hain

wo nigah-e-sharmagin ho ya kisi ka inkisar
jhuk ke jo mujh se mila wo ek KHanjar ho gaya

wo shama nahin hain ki hon ek raat ke mehman
jalte hain to bujhte nahin hum waqt-e-sahar bhi

ya dil hai mera ya tera naqsh-e-kaf-e-pa hai
gul hai ki ek aaina sar-e-rah paDa hai

sunta hun ki KHirman se hai bijli ko bahut lag
han ek nigah-e-ghalat-andaz idhar bhi

banne lage hain dagh sitare KHusha nasib
tarik aasman shab-e-intizar tha

tamhid thi junun ki gareban hua jo chaak
yani ye KHair-maqdam-e-fasl-e-bahaar tha

kya shikayat jo kaT gae gahak
mal hi jab dukan mein na raha

ek be-qarar dil se mulaqat kijiye
jab mil gae hain aap to kuchh baat kijiye

zindagi muKHtasar mili thi hamein
hasraten be-shumar le ke chale

aabaadiyon mein dasht ka manzar bhi aaega
guzroge shahr se to mera ghar bhi aaega

samne us ke ek bhi na chali
dil mein baaten hazar le ke chale

karna hai shairi agar 'naushad'
'mir' ka kulliyat yaad karo

na hoga raegan KHun-e-shahidan-e-watan hargiz
yahi surKHi banegi ek din unwan-e-azadi

KHuda ai kash 'nazish' jite-ji wo waqt bhi lae
ki jab hindostan kahlaega hindostan-e-azadi

jawano nazr de do apne KHun-e-dil ka har qatra
likha jaega hindostan ko farman-e-azadi

tah bah tah jamti chali jati hai sannaTon ki gard
haal-e-dil sab dekhte hain puchhta koi nahin

bichhaD ke tujh se mujhe hai umid milne ki
suna hai ruh ko aana hai phir badan ki taraf

uDai KHak jis sahra mein tere waste main ne
thaka-manda mila in manzilon mein aasman mujh ko

dil is tarah hawa-e-mohabbat mein jal gaya
bhaDki kahin na aag na uTTha dhuan kahin

banaya toD ke aaina aaina-KHana
na dekhi rah jo KHalwat se anjuman ki taraf

nashshe mein sujhti hai mujhe dur dur ki
naddi wo samne hai sharab-e-tuhur ki

jo ahl-e-dil hain alag hain wo ahl-e-zahir se
na main hun shaiKH ki jaanib na barhaman ki taraf

loTte rahte hain mujh par chahne walon ke dil
warna yun poshak teri malgaji hoti nahin

tu ne to apne dar se mujh ko uTha diya hai
parchhain phir rahi hai meri usi gali mein

apni duniya to bana li thi riya-karon ne
mil gaya KHuld bhi allah ko phuslane se

dard-e-dil se ishq ke be-pardagi hoti nahin
ek chamak uThti hai lekin raushni hoti nahin

kaba o but-KHana aarif ki nazar se dekhiye
KHwab donon ek hi hain farq hai tabir mein

meri baaton mein kya malum kab soe wo kab jage
sire se is liye kahni paDi phir dastan mujh ko

nazar kahin nahin ab aate hazrat-e-naseh
suna hai ghar mein kisi mah-laqa ke baiTh gae

roz-e-siyah mein sath koi de to jaaniye
jab tak farogh-e-shama hai parwana sath hai

asiri mein bahaar aai hai fariyaad-o-fughan kar len
nafas ko KHun-fishan kar len qafas ko bostan kar len

kiya hai us ne har ek se visal ka wada
is ishtiyaq mein marna zaruri hota hai

sahar ko uThte hain wo dekh kar kaf-e-rangin
ab aaine pe bhi sikke hina ke baiTh gae

yun main sidha gaya wahshat mein bayaban ki taraf
hath jis tarah se aata hai gareban ki taraf

uD ke jati hai meri KHak idhar gah udhar
kuchh pata de na gai umr-e-gurezan apna

ye dil ki be-qarari KHak ho kar bhi na jaegi
sunati hai lab-e-sahil se ye reg-e-rawan mujh ko

nadan kah rahe hain jise aaftab-e-hashr
zarra hai us ke ru-e-daraKHshan ke samne

ab hai dua ye apni har sham har sahar ko
ya wo badan se lipTe ya jaan tan se nikle

lazim hai soz-e-ishq ka shoala ayan na ho
jal bujhiye is tarah se ki mutlaq dhuan na ho

kya yahi thi shart kuchh insaf ki ai tund-KHu
jo bhala ho aap se us se burai kijiye

na pahuncha gosh tak ek tere haihat
hazaron nala nikla is dahan se

dam-e-takfin bhi gar yar aawe
to niklen hath bahar ye kafan se

janaza rok kar mera wo is andaz se bole
gali hum ne kahi thi tum to duniya chhoDe jate ho

ghazal us ne chheDi mujhe saz dena
zara umr-e-rafta ko aawaz dena

meri nash ke sirhane wo khaDe ye kah rahe hain
ise nind yun na aati agar intizar hota

dekhe baghair haal ye hai iztirab ka
kya jaane kya ho parda jo uTThe naqab ka

banawaT ho to aisi ho ki jis se sadgi Tapke
ziyaada ho to asli husn chhup jata hai zewar se

paigham zindagi ne diya maut ka mujhe
marne ke intizar mein jina paDa mujhe

KHatm ho jate jo husn o ishq ke naz o ada
shaeri bhi KHatm ho jati nubuwwat ki tarah

kal hum aaine mein ruKH ki jhurriyan dekha kiye
karwan-e-umr-e-rafta ka nishan dekha kiye

den bhi jawab-e-KHat ki na den kya KHabar mujhe
kyun apne sath le na gaya nama-bar mujhe

muddat hui hai bichhDe hue apne-ap se
dekha jo aaj tum ko to hum yaad aa gae

jaan jaane ko hai aur raqs mein parwana hai
kitna rangin mohabbat tera afsana hai

aam teri ye KHush-nasibi hai
warna langDon pe kaun marta hai

kitne chehre lage hain chehron par
kya haqiqat hai aur siyasat kya

us waqt mujh ko dawat-e-jam-o-subu mili
jis waqt main gunah ke qabil nahin raha

kaun kahta hai bulandi pe nahin hun 'sagar'
meri mearaj-e-mohabbat meri ruswai hai

talaq de to rahe ho itab-o-qahr ke sath
mera shabab bhi lauTa do meri mahr ke sath

mujh ko to id mein bhi faraghat kahan mili
laDti rahi hai sas sawere se sham tak

sahil pe qaid lakhon safinon ke waste
meri shikasta naw hai tufan liye hue

jo teri bazm se uTTha wo is tarah uTTha
kisi ki aankh mein aansu kisi ke daman mein

manzil na mili kashmakash-e-ahl-e-nazar mein
is bhiD se main apni nazar le ke chala hun

apni KHuddari salamat dil ka aalam kuchh sahi
jis jagah se uTh chuke hain us jagah phir jaen kya

ye bhi ek raat kaT hi jaegi
subh-e-farda ki muntazir hai nigah

kahi kisi se na rudad-e-zindagi main ne
guzar dene ki shai thi guzar di main ne

khinch bhi lijiye achchha to hai taswir-e-junun
aap ki bazm mein kya jaaniye kal hon ki na hon

chaha tha Thokaron mein guzar jae zindagi
logon ne sang-e-rah samajh kar haTa diya

naKHuda Dubne walon ki taraf muD ke na dekh
na karenge na kinaron ki tamanna ki hai

zindan mein aachanak hai ye kya shor-e-salasil
ye 'salik'-e-bebak ka matam to nahin hai

sitare ki tarah sine mein dil Duba kiya lekin
shab-e-gham ke andhere se nahin mangi sahar hum ne

yunhi insanon ke shahron mein mila apna wajud
kisi virane mein ek phul khila ho jaise

mahw yun ho gae alfaz-e-dua waqt-e-dua
hath se zarf-e-talab chhuT gaya ho jaise

nigah-e-mehr kahan ki wo barhami bhi gai
main dosti ko jo roya to dushmani bhi gai

mal-o-zar ahl-e-duwal samne yun ginte hain
hum faqiron ne na kuchh sarf kiya ho jaise

dil ne sine mein kuchh qarar liya
jab tujhe KHub sa pukar liya

nigah-e-shauq se lakhon bana Dale hain dar hum ne
qafas mein bhi nahin mani shikaste-baal-o-par hum ne

mai-KHana-e-hasti mein saqi hum donon hi mujrim hain shayad
KHum tu ne bacha ke rakkhe the paimane main ne toDe hain

bahaar-e-gulistan hum ko na pahchane tajjub hai
gulon ke ruKH pe chhiDka hai bahut KHun-e-jigar hum ne

nazar se dekh to saqi ek aaina banaya hai
shikasta shisha-o-saghar ke TukDe joD kar hum ne

aaj bhi hai wahi maqam aaj bhi lab pe un ka nam
manzil-e-be-shumar-gam apne safar ko kya karun

miT chuke jo bhi the tauba-shikani ke asbab
ab na mai-KHana na paimana na shisha na subu

dhuan deta hai daman-e-mohabbat
in aankhon se koi aansu gira hai

kaise ho kya hai haal mat puchho
mujh se mushkil sawal mat puchho

ek wahi shaKHs mujh ko yaad raha
jis ko samjha tha bhul jaunga

jhuTi ummid ki ungli ko pakaDna chhoDo
dard se baat karo dard se laDna chhoDo

koi shai ek si nahin rahti
umr Dhalti hai gham badalte hain

jab ye mana ki dil mein Dar hai bahut
tab kahin ja ke dil se Dar nikla

chand suraj ki tarah tum bhi ho qudrat ka khel
jaise ho waise raho banna bigaDna chhoDo

hum jo pahle kahin mile hote
aur hi apne silsile hote

wo bhi hamare nam se begane ho gae
hum ko bhi sach hai un se mohabbat nahin rahi

dekhe jo meri neki ko shak ki nigah se
wo aadmi bhi to mere andar hai kya karun

aisa nahin ki un se mohabbat na ho magar
pahle sa josh pahle si shiddat nahin rahi

zindagi hum se to is darja taghaful na barat
hum bhi shamil the tere chahne walon mein kabhi

ye tamanna hai ki ab aur tamanna na karen
sher kahte rahen chup chap taqaza na karen

kuchh to main bhi Dara Dara sa tha
aur kuchh rasta naya sa tha

wo ek KHwab jo phir lauT kar nahin aaya
wo ek KHayal jise main bhula nahin sakta

nikle the donon bhes badal ke to kya ajab
main DhunDta KHuda ko phira aur KHuda mujhe

kuchh to apne liye bhi rakhna hai
zaKHm auron ko kyun dikhaen sab

ye alag baat ki wo mujh se KHafa rahta hai
main ek insan hun aur mujh mein KHuda rahta hai

jo baat chhupai hai sab se wo un se chhupani mushkil hai
bahar ki kahani aasan hai andar ki kahani mushkil hai

zindagi is qadar kaThin kyun hai
aadmi ki bhala KHata kya hai

jis se sare charagh jalte the
wo charagh aaj kuchh bujha sa tha

apni aadat ki sab se sab kah den
shahr ka hai mizaj sannaTa

guftugu tir si lagi dil mein
ab hai shayad ilaj sannaTa

kya nahin jaanta mujhe koi
kya nahin shahr mein wo ghar baqi

jina azab kyun hai ye kya ho gaya mujhe
kis shaKHs ki lagi hai bhala bad-dua mujhe

jhankte raat ke gareban se
hum ne sau aaftab dekhe hain

KHali baramdon ne mujhe dekh kar kaha
kya baat hai udas se kuchh lag rahe ho tum

mujhe KHabar na thi is ghar mein kitne kamre hain
main kaise le ke wahan sari dastan jata

hazar chahen magar chhuT hi nahin sakti
baDi ajib hai ye mai-kashi ki aadat bhi

but samajhte the jis ko sare log
wo mere waste KHuda sa tha

zamana baDe shauq se sun raha tha
hamin so gae dastan kahte kahte

baghban ne aag di jab aashiyane ko mere
jin pe takiya tha wahi patte hawa dene lage

aadhi se ziyaada shab-e-gham kaT chuka hun
ab bhi agar aa jao to ye raat baDi hai

muTThiyon mein KHak le kar dost aae waqt-e-dafn
zindagi bhar ki mohabbat ka sila dene lage

mushkil-e-ishq mein lazim hai tahammul 'saqib'
baat bigDi hui banti nahin ghabrane se

sunne wale ro diye sun kar mariz-e-gham ka haal
dekhne wale taras kha kar dua dene lage

ai chaman walo chaman mein yun guzara chahiye
baghban bhi KHush rahe raazi rahe sayyaad bhi

hijr ki shab nala-e-dil wo sada dene lage
sunne wale raat kaTne ki dua dene lage

jis shaKHs ke jite ji puchha na gaya 'saqib'
us shaKHs ke marne par uTThe hain qalam kitne

apne dil-e-betab se main KHud hun pareshan
kya dun tumhein ilzam main kuchh soch raha hun

sone walon ko kya KHabar ai hijr
kya hua ek shab mein kya na hua

bu-e-gul phulon mein rahti thi magar rah na saki
main to kanTon mein raha aur pareshan na hua

us ke sunne ke liye jama hua hai mahshar
rah gaya tha jo fasana meri ruswai ka

kis nazar se aap ne dekha dil-e-majruh ko
zaKHm jo kuchh bhar chale the phir hawa dene lage

dida-e-dost teri chasm-numai ki qasam
main to samjha tha ki dar khul gaya mai-KHane ka

aap uTh rahe hain kyun mere aazar dekh kar
dil Dubte hain haalat-e-bimar dekh kar

kahne ko musht-e-par ki asiri to thi magar
KHamosh ho gaya hai chaman bolta hua

chal ai ham-dam zara saz-e-tarab ki chheD bhi sun len
agar dil baiTh jaega to uTh aaenge mahfil se

bala se ho pamal sara zamana
na aae tumhein panw rakhna sambhal kar

kitne dil the jo ho gae patthar
kitne patthar the jo sanam Thahre

main bagh mein hun talib-e-didar kisi ka
gul par hai nazar dhyan mein ruKHsar kisi ka

hum kis ko dikhate shab-e-furqat ki udasi
sab KHwab mein the raat ko bedar hamin the

wo khaDe kahte hain meri lash par
hum to sunte the ki nind aati nahin

kabhi to shahidon ki qabron pe aao
ye sab ghar tumhaare basae hue hain

jis taraf baiThte the wasl mein aap
usi pahlu mein dard rahta hai

aamad aamad hai KHizan ki jaane wali hai bahaar
rote hain gulzar ke dar baghban khole hue

bahut muzir dil-e-ashiq ko aah hoti hai
isi hawa se ye kashti tabah hoti hai

paD gai kya nigah-e-mast tere saqi ki
laDkhaDate hue mai-KHwar chale aate hain

mujh se lakhon KHak ke putle bana sakta hai tu
main kahan se ek tera sa KHuda paida karun

muntazir tere hain chashm-e-KHun-fishan khole hue
baiThe hain dil bechne wale dukan khole hue

har taraf hashr mein jhankar hai zanjiron ki
un ki zulfon ke giraftar chale aate hain

tamam umr kami ki kabhi na pani ne
ajab karim ki rahmat hai dida-e-tar par

wo intiha ke hain nazuk main saKHt-jaan hun kamal
ajab tarah ki musibat paDi hai KHanjar par

bar-e-KHatir hi agar hai to inayat kije
aap ko husn mubarak ho mera dil mujh ko

mujh se kya puchhte ho dagh hain dil mein kitne
tum ko ayyam-e-judai ka shumar aata hai

najd se jaanib-e-laila jo hawa aati hai
dil-e-majnun ke dhaDakne ki sada aati hai

dete phirte the hasinon ki gali mein aawaz
kabhi aaina-farosh-e-dil-e-hairan hum the

baDhte baDhte aatish-e-ruKHsar lau dene lagi
rafta rafta kan ke moti sharare ho gae

charagh-e-dagh main din se jalae baiTha hun
suna hai jo shab-e-furqat siyah hoti hai

uThte jate hain bazm-e-alam se
aane wale tumhaari mahfil ke

jalunga main ki dil us but ka ghair par aaya
uDegi aag ki patthar gira hai patthar par

mauj-e-dariya se bala ki chahiye kashti mujhe
ho jo bilkul na-muwafiq wo hawa paida karun

mujhe hai fikr KHat bheja hai jab se us gul-e-tar ko
hazaron bulbulen rokengi rassi mein kabutar ko

qafile raat ko aate the udhar jaan ke aag
dasht-e-ghurbat mein jidhar ai dil-e-sozan hum the

gaya shabab par itna raha talluq-e-ishq
dil o jigar mein tapak gah gah hoti hai

wahshat-e-dil ye baDhi chhoD diye ghar sab ne
tum hue KHana-nashin ho gain galiyan aabaad

shola-e-husn se tha dud-e-dil apna awwal
aag duniya mein na aai thi ki sozan hum the

saf dekha hai ki ghunchon ne lahu thuka hai
mausam-e-gul mein ilahi koi dil-gir na ho

raat mere pas tujh ko dekh kar
der tak ruThi rahin tanhaiyan

chal kar kabhi hamare andhere bhi dekhiye
hum log raushni mein baDe pur-waqar hain

chala tha main to samundar ki tishnagi le kar
mila ye kaisa sarabon ka silsila mujh ko

wo aae jata hai kab se par aa nahin jata
wahi sada-e-qadam ka hai silsila ki jo tha

diwana-war nachiye hansiye gulon ke sath
kanTe agar milen to jigar mein chubhoiye

malum hai 'urfi' jo hai qismat mein hamari
sahra hi koi girya-e-shabnam ko milega

dar-o-diwar pe hasrat se nazar karte hain
KHush raho ahl-e-watan hum to safar karte hain

be-murawwat ho bewafa ho tum
apne matlab ke aashna ho tum

yahi tashwish shab-o-roz hai bangale mein
lucknow phir kabhi dikhlae muqaddar mera

ulfat ne teri hum ko to rakkha na kahin ka
dariya ka na jangal ka sama ka na zamin ka

kamar dhoka dahan uqda ghazal aankhen pari chehra
shikam hira badan KHushbu jabin dariya zaban isa

yaad mein apne yar-e-jaani ki
hum ne mar mar ke zindagani ki

aaj kal lucknow mein ai 'aKHtar'
dhum hai teri KHush-bayani ki

turab-e-pa-e-hasinan-e-lakhnau hai ye
ye KHaksar hai 'aKHtar' ko naqsh-e-pa kahiye

mujhi ko waiza pand-o-nasihat
kabhi us ko bhi samjhaya to hota

gilauri raqibon ne bheji hai sahab
kisi aur ko bhi khila lijiyega

barae-sair mujh sa rind mai-KHane mein gar aae
gire saghar lunDhe shisha hanse saqi bahe dariya

'aKHtar'-e-zar bhi ho mushaf-e-ruKH par shaida
fal ye nek hai quran se hum dekhte hain

unhen bhi jine ke kuchh tajrabe hue honge
jo kah rahe hain ki mar jaana chahte hain hum

hum KHun ki qisten to kai de chuke lekin
ai KHak-e-watan qarz ada kyun nahin hota

cigareten chae dhuan raat gae tak bahsen
aur koi phul sa aanchal kahin nam hota hai

is tarah roz hum ek KHat use likh dete hain
ki na kaghaz na siyahi na qalam hota hai

ishq bin jine ke aadab nahin aate hain
'mir' sahab ne kaha hai ki miyan ishq karo

aaj tak jo bhi hua us ko bhula dena hai
aaj se tai hai ki dushman ko dua dena hai

kabhi bhule se bhi ab yaad bhi aati nahin jin ki
wahi qisse zamane ko sunana chahte hain hum

hum haar gae tum jit gae hum ne khoya tum ne paya
in chhoTi chhoTi baaton ka hum koi KHayal nahin karte

wahan hamara koi muntazir nahin phir bhi
hamein na rok ki ghar jaana chahte hain hum

musalla rakhte hain sahba-o-jam rakhte hain
faqir sab ke liye intizam rakhte hain

zamana aur abhi Thokaren lagae hamein
abhi kuchh aur sanwar jaana chahte hain hum

hamein tere siwa is duniya mein kisi aur se kya lena-dena
hum sab ko jawab nahin dete hum sab se sawal nahin karte

hamein anjam bhi malum hai lekin na jaane kyun
charaghon ko hawaon se bachana chahte hain hum

ishq ki rah mein yun had se guzar mat jaana
hon ghaDe kachche to dariya mein utar mat jaana

main jis ka jawab na de paun
aisa bhi koi sawal karna

main akasr aasman ke chand tare toD lata tha
aur ek nannhi si guDiya ke liye zewar banata tha

dosto DhunD ke hum sa koi pyasa lao
hum to aansu bhi jo pite hain to pani ki tarah

hamare shahr mein ab har taraf wahshat barasti hai
so ab jangal mein apna ghar banana chahte hain hum

dariya dikhai deta hai har ek reg-zar
shayad ki in dinon mujhe shiddat ki pyas hai

sab bichhDe sathi mil jaen murjhaen chehre khil jaen
sab chaak dilon ke sil jaen koi aisa kaam karo 'wali'

sameT bikhre hue kaghzat ko apne
koi sada tujhe wapas bulane wali hai

mauj-e-hawa aab-e-rawan aur ye zamin o aasman
ek roz sab jaenge thak allah bas baqi hawas

ye baDi talKH haqiqat hai koi jaane to
jurm-amez taKHayyul ke udhar kuchh nahin tha

itna masruf kar liya KHud ko
gham bhi aa kar KHushi se lauT gae

tumhaari KHush-nasibi hai ki tum samjhe nahin ab tak
akele-pan mein aur tanhai mein jo farq hota hai

kuchh umr apni zat ka dukh jhelte rahe
kuchh umr kaenat ka dukh jhelna paDa

ek laDki chuDiyan khanka rahi thi aur tabhi
us khanak se uTh raha tha jaise zindani ka shor

us se koi gila bhi karen hum to kya karen
wa'da koi kiya hi nahin us ne aaj tak

kisi se bhi muKHatib hon koi bhi baat hoti ho
tumhaara nam lene ka bahana DhunD lete hain

yahi sabab hai ki aksar udas rahte hain
jo hum se dur hain wo aas pas rahte hain

par sameTe KHud hi baiTha hai parinda ek taraf
jo qafas mein hi nahin us ko riha kaise karun

ek aalim hai jo sajdon mein gila karta hai
ek darwesh hai jo haalat-e-namnak mein KHush

had-e-nigah dekhiye banne ko gham-gusar
us ko bhi chup karaiye jo ro nahin raha

ujlat mein wo dekho kya kya chhoD gaya
apni baaten apna chehra chhoD gaya

meri man to meri jannat ko liye baiThi hai
aise kar lo mere purkhon ki dua tum rakh lo

KHana-ba-dosh ho mujhe hijr-o-visal ek
aise bhi KHush nahin hun main waise bhi KHush nahin

us ko rone se pahle kuchh hum ne yun tayyari ki
kone mein tanhai rakkhi kamre mein phailai raat

mera har sher haqiqat ki hai zinda taswir
apne ashaar mein qissa nahin likhkha main ne

koi puchhega jis din waqai ye zindagi kya hai
zamin se ek muTThi KHak le kar hum uDa denge

sabhi ke apne masail sabhi ki apni ana
pukarun kis ko jo de sath umr bhar mera

musalsal dhup mein chalna charaghon ki tarah jalna
ye hangame to mujh ko waqt se pahle thaka denge

ab nam nahin kaam ka qael hai zamana
ab nam kisi shaKHs ka rawan na milega

main ne likhkha hai use maryam o sita ki tarah
jism ko us ke ajanta nahin likhkha main ne

wo jis ko paDhta nahin koi bolte sab hain
janab-e-'mir' bhi kaisi zaban chhoD gae

chaho to meri aankhon ko aaina bana lo
dekho tumhein aisa koi darpan na milega

na jaane kyun adhuri hi mujhe taswir jachti hai
main kaghaz hath mein lekar faqat chehra banata hun

ada se dekh lo jata rahe gila dil ka
bas ek nigah pe Thahra hai faisla dil ka

apne begane se ab mujh ko shikayat na rahi
dushmani kar ke mere dost ne mara mujh ko

sindur us ki mang mein deta hai yun bahaar
jaise dhanak nikalti hai abr-e-siyah mein

aaKHir insan hun patthar ka to rakhta nahin dil
ai buto itna satao na KHuda-ra mujh ko

ai be-KHudi-e-dil mujhe ye bhi KHabar nahin
kis din bahaar aai main diwana kab hua

honThon mein dab kar jo gilauri di yar ne
kya dant pise ghairon ne kya kya chabae honTh

phir mujh se is tarah ki na kijega dil-lagi
KHair is ghaDi to aap ka main kar gaya lihaz

dast-e-junun ne phaD ke phenka idhar-udhar
daman abad mein hai to gareban azal mein hai

karo tum mujh se baaten aur main baaten karun tum se
kalim-ullah ho jaun main ejaz-e-takallum se

aasar-e-rihai hain ye dil bol raha hai
sayyaad sitamgar mere par khol raha hai

KHafa ho galiyan do chahe aane do na aane do
main bose lunga sote mein mujhe lapka hai chori ka

wo rind hun ki mujhe hathkaDi se baiat hai
mila hai gesu-e-jaanan se silsila dil ka

zamin panw ke niche se sarki jati hai
hamein na chheDiye hum hain falak satae hue

umr to apni hui sab but-parasti mein basar
nam ko duniya mein hain ab sahib-e-islam hum

KHuda-hafiz hai ab ai zahido islam-e-ashiq ka
butan-e-dahr ghaalib aa gae hain kaba-o-dil par

ai pari-zad jo tu raqs kare masti mein
dana-e-tak har ek panw mein ghunghru ho jae

KHaridari-e-jins-e-husn par raghbat dilata hai
bana hai shauq-e-dil dallal bazar-e-mohabbat ka

raste mein un ko chheD ke khate hain galiyan
bazar ki miThai bhi hoti hai kya laziz

yahi insaf tere ahd mein hai ai shah-e-husn
wajib-ul-qatl mohabbat ke gunahgar hain sab

yar ki fart-e-nazakat ka hun main shukr-guzar
dhyan bhi us ka mere dil se nikalne na diya

karenge hum se wo kyunkar nibah dekhte hain
hum un ki thoDe dinon aur chah dekhte hain

bana kar til ruKH-e-raushan par do shoKHi se se kahte hain
ye kajal hum ne yara hai charagh-e-mah-e-taban par

chala hai chhoD ke tanha kidhar tasawwur-e-yar
shab-e-firaq mein tha tujh se mashghala dil ka

yaad dilwaiye un ko jo kabhi wada-e-wasl
to wo kis naz se farmate hain hum bhul gae

ruKH tah-e-zulf hai aur zulf pareshan sar par
mang baalon mein nahin hai ye numayan sar par

manzil hai apni apni 'qalaq' apni apni gor
koi nahin sharik kisi ke gunah mein

kya koi dil laga ke kahe sher ai 'qalaq'
naqadri-e-suKHan se hain ahl-e-suKHan udas

wo ek raat to mujh se alag na soega
hua jo lazzat-e-bos-o-kanar se waqif

himmat ka zahidon ki sarasar qusur tha
mai-KHana KHanqah se aisa na dur tha

sitam wo tum ne kiye bhule hum gila dil ka
hua tumhaare bigaDne se faisla dil ka

ghaT par talwar ke nahlaiyo mayyat meri
kushta-e-abru hun main kya ghusl-KHana chahiye

khulne se ek jism ke sau aib Dhak gae
uryan-tani bhi josh-e-junun mein libas hai

chheDa agar mere dil-e-nalan ko aap ne
phir bhul jaiyega bajaana sitar ka

main wo mai-kash hun mili hai mujh ko ghuTTi mein sharab
shir ke badle piya hai main ne shira tak ka

'qalaq' ghazlen paDhenge ja-e-quran sab pas-e-murdan
hamari qabr par jab majma-e-ahl-e-suKHan hoga

tere honThon se sharma kar pasine mein hua ye tar
KHizar ne KHud araq ponchha jabin-e-ab-e-haiwan ka

aalam-e-piri mein kya mu-e-siyah ka eatibar
subh-e-sadiq deti hai jhuTi gawahi raat ki

kotah umr ho gai aur ye na kam hui
ai jaan aa ke tul-e-shab-e-intizar dekh

rah-e-haq mein khel jaan-bazi hai o zahir-parast
kya tamasha dar par mansur ne naT ka kiya

hua main rind-mashrab KHak mar kar is tamanna mein
namaz aaKHir paDhenge wo kisi din to tayammum se

gulgasht-e-bagh ko jo gaya wo gul-e-farang
ghunche salam karte the Topi utar ke

KHat mein likkhi hai haqiqat dasht-gardi ki agar
nama-bar jangali kabutar ko banana chahiye

jab hua garm-e-kalam-e-muKHtasar mahka diya
itr khincha yar ke lab ne gul-e-taqrir ka

misal-e-aina hum jab se hairati hain tere
ki jin dinon mein na tha tu singar se waqif

jame kya panw mere KHana-e-dil mein qanaat ka
jigar mein chuTkiyan leta hai naKHun dast-e-hajat ka

mudallal jo suKHan apna hai wo burhan-e-qatea hai
tabiat mein rawani hai ziyaada haft-qulzum se

un waizon ki zid se hum ab ki bahaar mein
toDenge tauba pir-e-mughan ki dukan par

mujh se un aankhon ko wahshat hai magar mujh ko hai ishq
khela karta hun shikar aahu-e-sahrai ka

mubarak dair-o-kaba hon 'qalaq' shaiKH-o-barahman ko
bichhaenge musalla chal ke hum mehrab-e-abru mein

kufr-o-islam ke jhagDon se chhuDaya sad-shukr
qaid-e-mazhab se junun ne mujhe aazad kiya

Thik nahin hai jis ka nishana us se bach
kab lag jae us ka nishana Thik nahin

bijli chamki to abr roya
yaad aa gai kya hansi kisi ki

apne siwa nahin hai koi apna aashna
dariya ki tarah aap hain apne kanar mein

na hoga koi mujh sa mahw-e-tasawwur
jise dekhta hun samajhta hun tu hai

ai junun hath jo wo zulf na aai hoti
aah ne arsh ki zanjir hilai hoti

nahin bachta hai bimar-e-mohabbat
suna hai hum ne 'goya' ki zabani

naqsh-e-pa panch-shaKHa qabar par raushan karo
mar gaya hun main tumhaari garmi-e-raftar par

sare quran se us pari-ru ko
yaad ek lafz-e-lan-tarani hai

na mar ke bhi teri surat ko dekhne dunga
paDunga ghair ki aankhon mein wo ghubar hun main

naseha aashiqi mein rakh mazur
kya karun aalam-e-jawani hai

wo tifl-e-nusairi aae shayad
qasmen dun murtaza-ali ki

zahido qudrat-e-KHuda dekho
but ko bhi dawa-e-KHudai hai

har gam pe hi sae se ek misra-e-mauzun
gar chand qadam chaliye to kya KHub ghazal ho

KHar chubh kar jo TuTta hai kabhi
aabla phuT phuT rota hai

zoaf se rahta hai ab panw pe sar
aap-apni Thokaren khate hain hum

jama-e-surKH tera dekh ke gul
pairahan apna qaba karte hain

KHun mera kar ke lagana na hina mere baad
dast rangin na hon angusht-numa mere baad

aasman kahte hain jis ko wo zamin-e-sher hai
mah-e-nau misra hai wasf-e-abru-e-KHamdar mein

gaya hai kucha-e-kakul mein ab dil
musalman warid-e-hindostan hai

dimagh aur hi pati hain in hasinon mein
ye mah wo hain nazar aaen jo mahinon mein

Thukra ke chale jabin ko meri
qismat ki likhi ne yawari ki

saKHt hai hairat hamein jo zer-e-abru KHal hai
hum to sunte the ki kabe mein koi hindu nahin

gar hamare qatl ke mazmun ka wo nama likhe
baiza-e-faulad se niklen kabutar saikDon

dar pe nalan jo hun to kahta hai
puchho kya chiz bechta hai ye

misl-e-tiflan wahshiyon se zid hai charKH-e-pir ko
gar talab munh ki karen barsae patthar saikDon

jo pinhan tha wahi har su ayan hai
ye kahiye lan tarani ab kahan hai

ek hath mein mere chae ka cup ek hath mein mere hath tera
hathon ko talab hai hathon ki aur dil ko talab hai sath tera

hai muqaddar mein zuleKHa se judai shayad
KHwab mein misr ke bazar nazar aate hain

muskuraata hun to rota hai mera zaKHm-e-jigar
rone lagta hun to honTon ko chubhan hoti hai

apne hathon ko chumta hoga
teri zulfen sanwarne wala

ulfat to dekhiye meri didar ke sabab
darwesh ban ke yar ki chaukhaT pe aa gaya

zawal ye hai ki hum zindagi se haar gae
kamal ye hai ki hum zindagi guzar gae

ghurbat ne chhin lin mere chehre ki raunaqen
yun to kisi amir se kamtar nahin hun main

aap ne eid mubarak to kaha hai lekin
aap ne eid manane ki ijazat nahin di

suna hai taliyan bajti hain us ki aamad par
suna hai log gharon se nikal ke dekhte hain

kuchh to KHayal kar meri umr-e-daraaz ka
sadiyan guzar gai hain tere intizar mein

shaiKH ji masjid mein jao mai-kade ko chhoD do
chaar din ki chandni hai phir andheri raat hai

ek muddat se nind tari hai
ek muddat se so nahin pae

waqt ke panw bhi nahin mehwar
aur raftar bhi ghazab ki hai

yaqin jaaniye tab ja ke pyar hota hai
kisi ke zehn pe jab dil sawar hota hai

aaj gar bole nahin haq baat par
kal sitam honge tumhaari zat par

hai muqaddar mein zuleKHa se judai shayad
KHwab mein misr ke bazar nazar aate hain

nafraton ka ilaj karna hai
kuchh mohabbat ata karo jaanan

ku-e-jaanan se apni sanson par
dil ki mayyat uTha ke le aae

tark-e-talluqat pe raazi nahin hun main
yani tumhaari baat pe raazi nahin hun main

is liye KHak se ulfat hai ki KHak hona hai
ye riwayat nahin aayat hai ki KHak hona hai

gale ka haar kyon samjha tha tum ne
agar pazeb ki jhankar tha main

'ajab safai hai us kuza-gar ke hathon mein
shikasta shai bhi salamat dikhai deti hai

sar kaTna chaho to baDe shauq se kaTo
nazren na uThana meri dastar ki jaanib

awwal to be-wafaon ki arwah khinchta
maut-o-hayat hoti agar iKHtiyar mein

tan li aankhon ne chadar nind ki
aap ka didar karne ke liye

hamari tabi'at ko sahra ki jaanib
hamara hi shauq-e-junun khinchta hai

meri aawaz pe labbaik na kahne wale
teri aahaT ko bhi aankhon se lagaya main ne

hamein bhi hoti kisi roz hasrat-e-didar
jo koh-e-tur pe musa gae nahin hote

firaq-e-yar ke dukhDe sunaenge kab tak
ki sama'in bhi mauzu' jadid chahte hain

mehnat-o-mashaqqat se zindagi mein rahat hai
hath ki lakiron mein kab likhi hain taqdiren

chhoD aaya putliyan subh-e-banaras jhil par
dil hamesha ke liye sham-e-awadh mein rakh diya

'ahd karta hai tera chahne wala tujh se
'umr-bhar sog manaega teri yaadon ka

main kucha-e-jaanan se su-e-dasht chala hun
kuchh der mein hone ko hai ab chand-gahan dekh

musafir kuch kar ke ja chuke hain
faqat sunsan rasta rah gaya hai

kisi bhi taur mil sake na tirgi ko rasta
charagh hi nazar mein ho charagh se charagh tak

mere zaKHmon pe namak Dalne wale sun le
tere zaKHmon ko mayassar nahin hoga marham

ghaur se dekhna hanste hue chehre ki taraf
ek manzar pas-e-manzar kai manzar dega

hamari sada-dili hum ne de diya KHanjar
unhon ne zikr kiya tha ki aazmana hai

KHwahish-e-nafs sada mar ke so jate hain
hum wo mazdur jo thak-haar ke so jate hain

wo apne abd-e-haqiqi ko aazmata hai
har ek bashar ka yahan imtihan nahin hota

sari duniya se ijtinab karo
ek hi shaKHs intiKHab karo

us ki urdu bolne wali aankhon ne
aksar mere honT siye hain nazron se

udasi ki tijarat kar rahe hain
firaq-e-yar hai pesha hamara

ye sada aa rahi hai qabron se
'ishq qatil hai hum gharibon ka

ana-parast hun mil jaun KHak mein lekin
KHarid sakta nahin koi mal zar se mujhe

zindagi tu mujhe kis moD pe le aai hai
kya koi aur bhi guzra hai idhar se pahle

ye roz roz ka jhagDa fasad Thik nahin
main chahta hun ki ab ain shin qaf karun

hum musafir hain kahan ghar ki taraf dekhte hain
har ghaDi mil ke patthar ki taraf dekhte hain

gar kuchh nahin hai yar tere pas gham to hai
tu KHush-nasib hai ki teri aankh nam to hai

bikhar gaya hun main rishton ki Dor se kaT kar
koi to aa ke sameTe idhar-udhar se mujhe

ye us se rabt-o-zabt baDhane ka hai sila
us ki KHata ko meri KHata mante hain log

log auron ke gareban pe nazar karte hain
hum yahi kaam ba-andaz-e-digar karte hain

lakh tabdiliyan bazaron mein aaen rahbar
main wo sikka hun jo har daur mein chal jaunga

aaj dekha unhen jab zamane ke baad
aankh nam ho gai muskurane ke baad

hum ne kirdar se badla hai chalan duniya ka
hum se sikhe koi tahzib rawadari ki

sab ta'alluq dhare ke dhare rah gae
ek tar-e-nafas TuT jaane ke baad

raho ghar mein ziyaada to safar aawaz deta hai
safar mein jab nikal jao to ghar aawaz deta hai

kahkashan chand sitare hain faqat naqsh-e-qadam
dekhte jao kahan tak hai rasai meri

zer-e-asar nahin hai kisi rahnuma ke hum
malik isi liye hain KHud apni raza ke hum

masarraton ke bahut aas-pas bhi na rahe
KHuda ka shukr magar hum udas bhi na rahe

pahle ye sochta rahta tha ki tanha ho jaun
aaj tanha hun to tanhai se Dar lagta hai

anjam-e-hijr kya hai ye tum KHud hi dekh lo
hum intizar-e-yar mein patthar ke ho gae

mar ke bhi tujh ko nai fikr ke pahlu dunga
tu mujhe qatl bhi kar dega to KHushbu dunga

KHun ka ghunT kabhi zahr piya hai main ne
zindagi tujh ko bahar-haal jiya hai main ne

hamin pe KHatm hai mear-e-gulshan-e-hasti
hamare baad na KHushbu chaman se aaegi

allah ne baKHshi hai mujhe aisi basirat
dariya bhi hua jata hai qatra mere aage

sharifana rakho kirdar lekin
sharafat buzdili hone na pae

jab samne nazar ke ho ek husn-e-be-panah
aise mein KHud ko hosh mein rakhna kamal hai

haalat hum se shahr ke yun puchhte hain log
jaise hum aadmi nahin aKHbar ho gae

us ki taraf se meri taraf aa rahe hain log
aahaT ye lag rahi hai kisi inqalab ki

meri aawaz mere jism mein yun gunjti hai
jaise sahra mein koi dard ki mari aawaz

jis ko dekho wo baDha jata hai su-e-manzil
kis ko fursat jo mere panw ke chhaale dekhe

dil hi TuTa ho kuchh ajab to nahin
ashk aankhon mein be-sabab to nahin

ye duniya hai yahan kuchh bhi ho lekin
wahan sharmindagi hone na pae

jab arsh-e-mualla pe mere naqsh-e-qadam hain
kya chiz hai phir auj-e-surayya mere aage

har taraf bikhri hain armanon ki lashen dur tak
zindagi ek jang ka maidan ho kar rah gai

sar-e-aflak hogi ruh miTTi mein badan hoga
karenge qadr ek din yun zamin-o-asman meri

jab sada sur ki gunjegi zamane-bhar mein
ek farishte mein simaT aaegi sari aawaz

ajib baat hai us raat ki sahar na hui
kai charag jale raushni magar na hui

jahan pe jhuT hai nafrat hai be-imani hai
wahin pe zindagi-bhar zindagi bitani hai

zaKHm chup-chap rahega to rafu bolega
tum mujhe qatl bhi kar do to lahu bolega

main shajar dekh ke Dar jata hun
is qadar dhup ki aadat hai mujhe

lauTa jab chand bhi suraj bhi KHasara kar ke
hum ne chamka diya aangan ko sitara kar ke

rasm-e-duniya ke bayaban mein bichhaDne wale
ishq-e-awara tujhe DhunDh raha hai ab tak

baDi hi andheri Dagar hai miyan
jahan hum faqiron ka ghar hai miyan

ye dil-fareb charaghan ye qahqahon ke hujum
main Dar raha hun ab is shahar se guzarte hue

jab se is dasht mein aaya hun isi soch mein hun
ki bayaban mein kya soch kar aata hai koi

guzari umr hum ne aabiyari mein kisi ki
wo apna ek kar-e-be-samar tha aur hum the

zara sambhlo tumhaari wahshaton ke zikr 'salman'
jahan hone nahin the ab wahan bhi ho rahe hain

ye aasman hai behtar ki aashiyan mera
parind soch raha hai uDan bharte hue

aaj ghaalib hai mere sar par ishq
aaj main 'mir' hua chahta hun

jab Dub ke marna hai to kya soch rahe ho
in jhil si aankhon mein utar kyun nahin jate

jang ka shor bhi kuchh der to tham sakta hai
phir se ek amn ki afwah uDa di jae

ye kaisa dasht-e-tahayyur hai yan se kuch karo
hamare panw se raftar khinchta hai koi

tu mere sath nahin hai to sochta hun main
ki ab to tujh se bichhaDne ka koi Dar bhi nahin

shaKH-e-mizhgan pe mahakne lage zaKHmon ke gulab
pichhle mausam ki mulaqat ki bu zinda hai

in dinon apni bhi wahshat ka ajab aalam hai
ghar mein hum dasht-o-bayaban uTha lae hain

hawa ki Dor mein TuTe hue tare piroti hai
ye tanhai ajab laDki hai sannaTe mein roti hai

han waz-e-ehtiyat ka qail nahin hun mein
jo zaKHm hai jigar mein chhupane se main raha

chashm-e-KHush-ab ki tamsil mein rahne wale
hum parinde hain isi jhil mein rahne wale

ek nae tarz pe aabaad karenge us ko
hum tere shahr ki pahchan uTha lae hain

is aajizi se kiya us ne mere sar ka sawal
KHud apne hath se talwar toD di main ne

ret par wo paDi hai mushk koi
tir bhi aur kaman sa kuchh hai

burida-sar ko saja de fasil-e-neza par
darida jism ko phir arsa-e-qital mein rakh

tir mat dekh mere zaKHm ko dekh
yar-e-yar apna adu mein gum hai

kis liye karte ho tum harf-e-malamat se gurez
hum kahan sohbat-e-jibril mein rahne wale

baDhte chale gae jo wo manzil ko pa gae
main pattharon se panw bachane mein rah gaya

sathi mere kahan se kahan tak pahunch gae
main zindagi ke naz uThane mein rah gaya

yahan hum ne kisi se dil lagaya hi nahin 'manzar'
ki is duniya se aaKHir ek din be-zar hona tha

ye mere sathi hain pyare sathi magar inhen bhi nahin gawara
main apni wahshat ke maqbare se nai tamanna ke KHwab dekhun

marhale aur aane wale hain
tir apna abhi kaman mein rakh

ye to sach hai ki wo sitamgar hai
dar par aaya hai to aman mein rakh

tazkira ho tera zamane mein
aisa pahlu koi bayan mein rakh

har bar hi main jaan se jaane mein rah gaya
main rasm-e-zindagi jo nibhane mein rah gaya

suna ye tha bahut aasuda hain sahil ke bashinde
magar TuTi hui kashti mein dariya par hona tha

is mahfil mein main bhi kya bebak hua
aib o hunar ka sara parda chaak hua

bana ke wahm o guman ki duniya haqiqaton ke sarab dekhun
main apne hi aaine mein KHud ko jahan bhi dekhun KHarab dekhun

phir yun hua ki zindagi ek bojh ban gai
ek shaKHs mere hath se yak-laKHt kho gaya

KHuddar KHud-parast hain ziddi bala ke hain
hum jo gae to lauT ke wapas na aaenge

wo meri sadgi pe marta hai
mujh ko gahnon ki kya zarurat hai

KHamushi ka sabab nahin kuchh bhi
mujh ko bas guftugu se nafrat hai

suno aao naya ek zaKHm baKHsho
tumhaara hijr buDha ho gaya hai

hamein us se juda hona paDa tha
hamare beach duniya aa gai thi

ishq hai mujh se use ya ki faqat hamdardi
jab bhi wo chhoD ke jata hai palaT aata hai

faqat umid hai baKHshish ki teri rahmat se
wagarna afw ke qabil mere gunah nahin

uDaun kyun na gareban ki dhajjiyan haihat
wahi ye hath hain jin mein kisi ka daman tha

un se mere nasib ka chakkar bana diya
kuchh gardishen jo bach rahin lail-o-nahaar se

jazbe ki kaDi dhup ho to kya nahin mumkin
ye kis ne kaha sang pighalta hi nahin hai

hasad ka rang pasandida rang hai sab ka
yahan kisi ko koi ab dua nahin deta

sune kitne baam hue kitne aangan be-nur hue
chand se chehre yaad aate hain chand nikalte waqt bahut

hamein KHuda pe bharosa hai na-KHuda pe nahin
KHuda jo deta hai wo na-KHuda nahin deta

mausam-e-gul tere sadqe teri aamad ke nisar
dekh mujh se mera saya bhi juda hai ab ke

ek tere hi kuche par mauquf nahin hai kuchh
har gam hain taziren hum log jahan bhi hain

KHwabida apne chahne walon ko dekh kar
mumkin hai lauT jae sahar jagte raho

isi hasrat mein kaTi rah-e-hayat
koi do-chaar qadam sath chale

kitne mahbub gharon se gae kis ko malum
wapas aae hain jo apnon mein KHabar ki surat

dekho us ne qadam qadam par sath diya begane ka
'aKHtar' jis ne ahd kiya tha tum se sath nibhane ka

mai-e-kohna na sahi KHun-e-tamanna hi sahi
ek paimana mere samne laya to gaya

sach ye hai hum hi mohabbat ka sabaq paDh na sake
warna an-paDh to na the hum ko paDhane wale

shahr ki galiyon aur saDkon par phirte hain mayusi mein
kash koi 'anwar' se puchhe aise be-ghar kitne hain

tumhaare dil mein koi aur bhi hai mere siwa
guman to hai zara sa magar yaqin nahin

husn aisa ki zamane mein nahin jis ki misal
aur jamal aisa ki DhunDa kare har KHwab-o-KHayal

hum fitratan insan hain farishte to nahin hain
dawa ye karen kaise ki laghzish nahin karte

daman pe to har ek ke chhiTen hain KHun ki
ab kis se puchhiye ki gunahgar kaun hai

kaisa maqam aaya mohabbat ki rah mein
dil ro raha hai mera magar aankh tar nahin

hai taqaza-e-tahzib 'anwar'
mat kaho wo ki jo munh mein aae

bahut aasan hai mushtarka dilon mein tafriq
baat to jab hai ki bichhDon ko milaya jae

roz uTh jati hai ghar mein koi diwar nai
is tarah tang hua jata hai aangan apna

hum se wafa-shiar ko bhi tere ru-ba-ru
khani paDi wafa ki qasam tere shahr mein

tumhaara husn aaraish tumhaari sadgi zewar
tumhein koi zarurat hi nahin banne sanwarne ki

idhar se aaj wo guzre to munh phere hue guzre
ab un se bhi hamari be-kasi dekhi nahin jati

zindagi aur zindagi ki yaadgar
parda aur parde pe kuchh parchhaiyan

ishq se log mana karte hain
jaise kuchh iKHtiyar hai apna

bhulne wale ko shayad yaad wada aa gaya
mujh ko dekha muskuraya KHud-ba-KHud sharma gaya

bahana mil na jae bijliyon ko TuT paDne ka
kaleja kanpta hai aashiyan ko aashiyan kahte

ye sochte hi rahe aur bahaar KHatm hui
kahan chaman mein nasheman bane kahan na bane

sana teri nahin mumkin zaban se
maani dur phirte hain bayan se

aah kis se kahen ki hum kya the
sab yahi dekhte hain kya hain hum

phirte hue kisi ki nazar dekhte rahe
dil KHun ho raha tha magar dekhte rahe

ek baat bhala puchhen kis tarah manaoge
jaise koi ruTha hai aur tum ko manana hai

jo aap kahen us mein ye pahlu hai wo pahlu
aur hum jo kahen baat mein wo baat nahin hai

aap ka KHat nahin mila mujh ko
daulat-e-do-jahan mili mujh ko

kuchh der fikr aalam-e-baala ki chhoD do
is anjuman ka raaz isi anjuman mein hai

kya kya duaen mangte hain sab magar 'asar'
apni yahi dua hai koi muddaa na ho

qasid payam un ka na kuchh der abhi suna
rahne de mahw-e-lazzat-e-zauq-e-KHabar mujhe

jo saza dije hai baja mujh ko
tujh se karni na thi wafa mujh ko

palken ghaneri gopiyon ki Toh liye hue
radha ke jhankne ka jharoka ghazab ghazab

aaj kuchh mehrban hai sayyaad
kya nasheman bhi ho gaya barbaad

karam par bhi hota hai dhoka sitam ka
yahan tak alam-ashna ho gae hum

baat khote jo iltija karte
ai dil-e-na-murad kya karte

ek ujDa hua diya hun main
aage aaya hai sab kiya mera

ab dekhna hai mujh ko tere aastan ka zarf
sar ko jhuka raha hun baDi aajizi ke sath

kuchh be-adabi aur shab-e-wasl nahin ki
han yar ke ruKHsar pe ruKHsar to rakkha

umid ka ye rang hai hujum-e-ranj-o-yas mein
ki jis tarah koi hasin ho matami libas mein

lazzat kabhi thi ab to musibat si ho gai
mujh ko gunah karne ki aadat si ho gai

kyun ulajhte ho har ek baat pe 'beKHud' un se
tum bhi nadan bane jate ho nadan ke sath

nasheman phunkne wale hamari zindagi ye hai
kabhi roe kabhi sajde kiye KHak-e-nasheman par

us ke hathon na mila chain mujhi ko dam bhar
mujh se le kar dil-e-betab karoge kya tum

hasr kaba pe kya hai der sahi
haj ka mausam nahin to sair sahi

wahan ab sans lene ki sada aati hai mushkil se
jo zindan gunjta rahta tha aawaz-e-salasil se

ye duniya nafraton ke aaKHri stage pe hai
ilaj is ka mohabbat ke siwa kuchh bhi nahin hai

din kaTa fariyaad se aur raat zari se kaTi
umr kaTne ko kaTi par kitni KHwari se kaTi

itne kam-zarf nahin hum jo bahakte jawen
misl-e-gul jawen jidhar jawen mahakte jawen

mat karo fikr imarat ki koi zer-e-falak
KHana-e-dil jo gira hai use tamir karo

baha hai phuT ke aankhon se aabla dil ka
tari ki rah se jata hai qafila dil ka

bayan main kis se karun ja ke ab gila dil ka
ye dil ka dil hi mein howega faisla dil ka

ja phansa dil zulf mein ab soiye
sham ke murde ko kab tak Dhoiye

nahin hai KHub sohbat har kisi kam-zarf se lekin
nahin gar mante az-rah-e-nadani to behtar hai

dil ke badle wo shoKH chalte waqt
de gaya hum ko intizar apna

dil to be-tarah mera lag hi chala tha us se
par main jun tun ke bachaya ise KHuddari se

ho umr daraaz zaKHm-e-dil ki
jis se dar-e-dil ko baz paya

rahta hai kaleje mein nihan dard-e-mohabbat
ye choT wo hai jis ko ubharna nahin aata

piyala zahr ka lae ho pine kyon nahin dete
mere marne pe rona hai to jine kyon nahin dete

wasl ke do-chaar lamhe roz gin gin dekhna
rah gaya tha zindagi mein kya yahi din dekhna

KHwab mein chuma tha tum ne aur tab se aaj tak
gher leti hain mujhe har gulsitan ki titliyan

din-ba-din rog ye baDhta hi chala jata hai
din-ba-din tu meri buniyaad hui jati hai

tere kandhe pe mohabbat ka Tika hai parcham
jaan be-shak na rahe haar na hone pae

chaar diwaren tamasha dekhti hain roz raat
nachti hai zindagi aur takta rahta hun main

hai iKHtiyar hamein kaenat par hasil
sawal ye hai ki hum kis ke iKHtiyar mein hain

hamein ujal de phir dekh apne jalwon ko
hum aaina hain magar parda-e-ghubar mein hain

aankhen na jine dengi teri be-wafa mujhe
kyun khiDkiyon se jhank rahi hai qaza mujhe

hum na kahte the hansi achchhi nahin
aa gai aaKHir rukawaT dekhiye

KHuda alim hai har shaKHs ki banawaT ka
kaho namaziyo sajde kiye ki sar paTka

banawaT waza-dari mein ho ya be-saKHta-pan mein
hamein andaz wo bhata hai jis mein kuchh ada nikle

KHwahish-e-didar mein aankhen bhi hain meri raqib
sat pardon mein chhupa rakkha hai us ke nur ko

mujh ko rone to do dikha dunga
bulbula hai ye aasman nahin

kausar ka jam us ko ilahi nasib ho
koi sharab meri lahad par chhiDak gaya

juta naya pahan ke wo panjon ke bal chale
kapDe badal ke jame se bahar nikal chale

uD gai Topi bhi sar ke jab chali baad-e-wabaal
taj-e-shah ko morchhal aandhi ka jhonka ho gaya

kafir-e-ishq hun main sab se mohabbat hai mujhe
ek but kya ki samaya hai kalisa dil mein

tu KHizan mein jo sair ko nikle
hare ho jaen be-bahaar daraKHt

zalim hamari aaj ki ye baat yaad rakh
itna bhi dil-jalon ka satana bhala nahin

main hath joDta hun baDi der se huzur
lag jaiye gale se ab inkar ho chuka

ek bosa meri tanKHwah mile na mile
aarzu hai ki na qadmon se ye naukar chhuTe

zahid sunaun wasf jo apni sharab ke
paDhne lagen darud farishte sawab ke

kisi ne kaba banaya kisi ne but-KHana
bana na ek gharaunda tumhaare ghar ki tarah

qazi ko jo rind kuchh chaTa den
masjid ki baghal mein mai-kada ho

pyar ki aankh se dushman ko bhi jo dekhte hain
hum ne aise bhi hain allah ke pyare dekhe

na mohabbat hai dilon mein na haya aankhon mein
ye sanam tu ne banae hain KHudaya kaise

mujh se bhi rahgir se bhi rah yar ko
yaksan hai donon panw tale KHair-o-shar ki rah

ghair par kyun nigah karte ho
mujh ko is tir ka nishana karo

jaan sadqe ek bose par karenge umr-bhar
dekh lo munh se mila kar munh hamara jhuT sach

diwangi mein phenk rahe the jo hum libas
utri qaba buKHar badan se utar gaya

duniya mein 'bahr' kaun ibaadat-guzar hai
saum-o-salat daKHil-e-rasm-o-riwaj hai

bhaTak ke koi gaya dair ko koi kabe
ajib bhul-bhulayyan hai marhala dil ka

mera dil kis ne liya nam bataun kis ka
main hun ya aap hain ghar mein koi aaya na gaya

abr-e-bahaar ab bhi jachta nahin nazar mein
kuchh aansuon ke qatre ab bhi hain chashm-e-tar mein

hai nagina har ek uzw-e-badan
tum ko kya ehtiyaj zewar ki

be-tarah dil mein bhara rahta hai zulfon ka dhuan
dam nikal jae kisi roz na ghuT kar apna

dikhaya us ne ban-Than kar wo jalwa apni surat ka
ki pani phir gaya aaine par dariya-e-hairat ka

nemat-e-duniya ki jin ko chah hai nadan hain
daya-e-ayyam ke pistan habab-e-shir hai

amir shaal do-shaalon mein garm-e-rahat-o-aish
gharib ke liye jaDon mein zindagani dhup

zahido dawat-e-rindan hai sharab aur kabab
kabhi maiKHane mein bhi roza-kushai ho jae

ungliyan tu ne jo ai rashk-e-chaman chaTkain
mujh ko ghunchon ke chaTakne ki sadaen aain

baalon mein bal hai aankh mein surma hai munh mein pan
ghar se nikal ke panw nikale nikal chale

puchhe rindon se koi in muftiyon ka jhuT sach
do dalilon se ye kar lete hain dawa jhuT sach

kya KHabar thi subh ho jaegi tere nur se
sham se mera charagh-e-KHana ruKHsat mangta

qatl par biDa uTha kar tegh kya bandhoge tum
lo KHabar apni dahan gum hai kamar milti nahin

mera lahu chaTaega jab tak na tegh ko
qatil ko dahne hath se khana haram hai

aashiq se nak-bhaun na chaDha o kitab-ru
hum dars-e-ishq mein ye alif bhi paDhe nahin

yar tak le na gae ashk baha kar hum ko
is ko bhi dekh liya dida-e-tar kuchh bhi nahin

nama kya yar ko pahunchaya ki mearaj hui
arsh par baiTh ke gunjega kabutar apna

na niklega dil us ke gesu mein phans kar
ye kala kabhi man ugalta nahin hai

ratb-o-yabis mein hai tasarruf-e-ishq
aankh dariya hai dil jazira hai

zahir-parast KHalq hai zahir durust kar
kaise sifat-o-zat jo kuchh hai libas hai

hoga zarur ek na ek din mubahisa
rizwan se aur ku-e-sanam ke muqim se

aae bhi to khae na gilauri na mala itr
roki meri dawat mujhe mehman se gila hai

muKHtar hain wo likkhen na likkhen jawab-e-KHat
sahab ko roz apna ariza report hai

KHub chalti hai naw kaghaz ki
ghar mein qazi ke mal aata hai

waizo hum rind kyun-kar kabil-e-jannat nahin
kya gunahgaron ko miras-e-pidar milti nahin

tumhein ghairon se kab fursat hum apne gham se kam KHali
chalo bas ho chuka milna na tum KHali na hum KHali

uD gai par se taqat-e-parwaz
kahin sayyaad ab riha na kare

watan ke jaan-nisar hain watan ke kaam aaenge
hum is zamin ko ek roz aasman banaenge

dilon mein hubb-e-watan hai agar to ek raho
nikhaarna ye chaman hai agar to ek raho

ai ahl-e-watan sham-o-sahar jagte rahna
aghyar hain aamada-e-shar jagte rahna

banana hai hamein ab apne hathon apni qismat ko
hamein apne watan ka aap beDa par karna hai

kahin aisa na ho mar jaun main hasrat hi hasrat mein
jo lena ho to le lo sab se pahle imtihan mera

shab-e-wasl kya jaane kya yaad aaya
wo kuchh aap hi aap sharma rahe hain

tum pas jo aae kho gae hum
jab tum na mile to justuju ki

tumhein hai nashsha jawani ka hum mein ghaflat-e-ishq
na iKHtiyar mein tum ho na iKHtiyar mein hum

ye ek bose pe itni bahs ye zeba nahin tum ko
nahin hai yaad mujh ko KHair achchha le liya hoga

surat na yun dikhae unhen bar bar chand
paida kare hasinon mein kuchh e'tibar chand

sab KHat tamam kar chuke paDh paDh ke shauq se
wan tham gae jahan pe mera nam aa gaya

ummid ka bura ho samjha ki aap aae
be-wajh shab ko hil kar zanjir-e-dar ne mara

tum diye jao yunhi hum ko hawa daman ki
hum se behosh nahin hosh mein aane wale

KHak uD ke hamari tere kuche mein pahunchti
taqdir thi ye bhi ki hawa bhi na chali aaj

hai dilon ka wahi jo dana-e-tasbih ka haal
yun mile hain pa hain dar-asl juda ek se ek

un ko to sahl hai wo ghair ke ghar jaenge
hum jo us dar se uThenge to kidhar jaenge

jis jagah jaen bana len tere wahshi sahra
KHak le aae hain muTThi mein bayabanon ki

abhi to aag sine mein kahin kam hai kahin zaid
agar mil paenge aapas mein sab chhaale to kya hoga

abr mein chand gar na dekha ho
ruKH pe zulfon ko Dal kar dekho

sach kahte hain ki nam mohabbat ka hai baDa
ulfat jata ke dost ko dushman bana liya

na KHanjar uThega na talwar in se
ye bazu mere aazmae hue hain

log kahte hain ki fann-e-shairi manhus hai
sher kahte kahte main deputy collector ho gaya

pura karenge holi mein kya wada-e-visal
jin ko abhi basant ki ai dil KHabar nahin

teri tarif ho ai sahib-e-ausaf kya mumkin
zabanon se dahanon se takallum se bayanon se

ho gae ram jo tum ghair se a jaan-e-jahan
jal rahi hai dil-e-pur-nur ki lanka dekho

chalti to hai par shoKHi-e-raftar kahan hai
talwar mein pazeb ki jhankar kahan hai

sabz kapDon mein siyah-zulf ki zebai hai
dhan ke khet mein kya kali ghaTa chhai hai

hain din ke paband na duniya ke muqayyad
kya ishq ne is bhul-bhulayyan se nikala

dariya-e-sharab us ne bahaya hai hamesha
saqi se jo kashti ke talabgar hue hain

phir na baqi rahe ghubar kabhi
holi khelo jo KHaksaron mein

naw kaghaz ki tan-e-KHaki-e-insan samjho
gharq ho jaengi chhinTa jo paDa pani ka

chaalis jam pi ke diya ek jam-e-mai
saqi ne KHub rah nikali zakat ki

ek baat par qarar unhen raat-bhar nahin
do do pahar jo han hai to do do pahar nahin

agar un ko puja to kya kufr hoga
ki but bhi KHuda ke banae hue hain

is qadar mahw na hon aap KHud-arai mein
dagh lag jae na aaina-e-yaktai mein

tu jo talwar se nahlae lahu mein mujh ko
ghusl-e-sehhat hua bhi ishq ki bimari se

un ko ushshaq hi ke dil ki nahin hai taKHsis
koi shisha ho pari ban ke utar jate hain

wo aur maraz hain ki shifa hoti hai jin se
achchhe kahin un aankhon ke bimar hue hain

hawa se kah do ki yun KHud ko aazma ke dikhae
bahut charagh bujhati hai ek jala ke dikhae

bichhaD jaane ka gham tauba are tauba are tauba
ye wo hai jo ki dimak ki tarah sab chaT jata hai

nazar aankhon ki gum si ho rahi hai
ki ab tum bas sunai de rahe ho

'saba' hum ne to hargiz kuchh na dekha jazb-e-ulfat mein
ghalat ye baat kahte hain ki dil ko rah hai dil se

naseh nasihaten ye kahan yaad rahti hain
hazrat abhi kisi se tabiat lagi nahin

bhaTka phire hai majnun laila ke qafile mein
ye puchhta ki yaro mahmil kidhar gaya hai

nahin malum ai yaro 'saba' ke dil mein kya aaya
abhi jo baiThe baiThe wo yakayak aah kar uTTha

kya tu ne kuchh 'saba' se ai tund-KHu kaha hai
rota hua idhar se ba-chashm-e-tar gaya hai

mera hi man nahin lagta hai us mein
ki us ka man bhi mujh se bhar gaya hai

mar gai man to baT gae zewar
baT gaya ghar pita ke marte hi

wo zid karti hai lekin phir achanak man jati hai
mere chehre ki rangat se wo qimat jaan jati hai

ye sham Dhal rahi thi ki aai KHabar buri
pani ke intizar mein ek jhil mar gai

hum sabhi aakash mein laTke hue
sochte hain ki zamin pe panw hai

hum se hamare KHwab bhi jab dur ho gae
majbur tab hue yun ki mazdur ho gae

kamane aur ganwane mein bacha paya hun bas itna
hamare ghar purane dost dekho ab bhi aate hain

sirf sha'ir hi rahta hai zinda
aadmi ko to mar hi jaana hai

chiz koi nahin dusri chahiye
baat jis ki hui thi wahi chahiye

raha tha mal mere chehre pe kalikh
wo shisha saf thoDi kar raha tha

balaen le raha hun is zamin ke zarre zarre ki
luTa tha jis jagah rah-e-wafa mein karwan mera

shikwa-e-hijr-e-yar kaun kare
husn ko sharmsar kaun kare

de ke saghar mujhe kis lutf se saqi ne kaha
dekhte jao abhi hum tumhein kya dete hain

sadgi ki intiha kar di jawanan chaman
umr bhar rang mizaj baghban dekha kiye

wufur-e-shauq mein ek ek qadam mera qayamat tha
KHuda malum kyun-kar jalwa-zar-e-husn tak pahuncha

charKH ko kab ye saliqa hai sitamgari mein
koi mashuq hai is parda-e-zangari mein

dard ho dil mein to dawa kije
aur jo dil hi na ho to kya kije

gham mein kuchh gham ka mashghala kije
dard ki dard se dawa kije

tafriq husn-o-ishq ke andaz mein na ho
lafzon mein farq ho magar aawaz mein na ho

jaane wale ja KHuda hafiz magar ye soch le
kuchh se kuchh ho jaegi diwangi tere baghair

ghussa qatil ka na baDhta hai na kam hota hai
ek sar hai ki wo har roz qalam hota hai

bahki bahki nigah-e-naz KHuda KHair kare
husn mein ishq ke andaz KHuda KHair kare

muddaton baad kabhi ai nazar aane wale
id ka chand na dekha teri surat dekhi

mangne par kya na dega taqat-e-sabr-o-sukun
jis ne be mange ata kar di pareshani mujhe

chune the phul muqaddar se ban gae kanTe
bahaar hae hamare liye bahaar nahin

zulm par zulm aa gae ghaalib
aable aablon ko chhoD gae

ghar ko chhoDa hai KHuda jaane kahan jaane ko
ab samajh lijiye TuTa hua tara mujh ko

kabhi to apna samajh kar jawab de Dalo
badal badal ke sadaen pukarta hun main

phir munh se are kah kar paimana gira dije
phir toDiye dil mera phir lijiye angDai

wo to kahiye aap ki ulfat mein dil bahla raha
warna duniya chaar din bhi rahne ke qabil na thi

ek neamat tere mahjur ke hath aai hai
id ka chand charagh-e-shab-e-tanhai hai

mohabbat to hum ne bhi ki aur bahut ki
magar husn ko ishq karna na aaya

hansi aane ki baat hai hans raha hun
mujhe log diwana farma rahe hain

khelna aag ke shoalon se kuchh aasan nahin
bas ye ek baat KHuda-dad hai parwane mein

duniya ko din din ko duniya karenge hum
tere banenge hum tujhe apna karenge hum

aap ki yaad mein roun bhi na main raaton ko
hun to majbur magar itna bhi majbur nahin

ye insan nadida ulfat ka mara
KHuda jaane kis kis ko sajda karega

mujhe miTa ke wo yun baiThe muskuraate hain
kisi se jaise koi nek kaam ho jae

ahd-e-shabab-e-rafta kya ahd-e-pur-faza tha
jine ka bhi maza tha marne ka bhi maza tha

marg-e-ashiq pe farishta maut ka badnam tha
wo hansi roke hue baiTha tha jis ka kaam tha

do ghaDi dil ke bahlane ka sahaara bhi gaya
lijiye aaj tasawwur mein bhi tanhai hai

mujhe to baKHshiye aur jine dije
mubarak aap hi ko aap ka dil

jagmagati teri aankhon ki qasam furqat mein
baDe dukh deti hai ye taron bhari raat mujhe

hain sau tariqe aur bhi ai be-qarar dil
izhaar-e-shikwa shikwe ke andaz mein na ho

ahl-e-mahshar dekh lun qatil ko to pahchan lun
bholi-bhaali shakl thi aur kuchh bhala sa nam tha

hum wahshiyon ka maskan kya puchhta hai zalim
sahra hai to sahra hai zindan hai to zindan hai

jama hum karte gae chun chun ke tinke bagh mein
aur na jaane kis ka kis ka aashiyan banta gaya

meri raat kyun kar kaTegi ilahi
mujhe din ko tare nazar aa rahe hain

miTane wale hamara hi ghar miTana tha
chaman mein ek se ek achchha aashiyana tha

ab itna aql se begana ho gaya hun main
gulon ke shikwe sitaron se kah raha hun main

shab-e-hijr yun dil ko bahla rahe hain
ki din bhar ki biti ko dohra rahe hain

hui diwangi is darja mashhur-e-jahan meri
jahan do aadmi bhi hain chhiDi hai dastan meri

bura ho ishq ka sab kuchh samajh raha hun main
bana raha hai koi ban raha hun diwana

apni biti na kahun teri kahani na kahun
phir maza kahe se paida karun afsane mein

in se jab puchha gaya bismil tumhaare kya karen
hans ke bole zaKHm-e-dil dekha karen roya karen

ek musa the ki un ka zikr har mahfil mein hai
aur ek main hun ki ab tak mere dil ki dil mein hai

kisi aankh mein nind aae to jaanun
mera qissa-e-gham kahani nahin hai

kam-sini kya kam thi is par qahr hai shakki mizaj
apna nawak mere dil se khinch kar dekha kiye

kijiye kyun murda armanon se chheD
sone walon ko to sone dijiye

na dil mein lahu hai na aankhon mein aansu
ghamon ki nichoDi hui aastin hun

waiz se na puchhunga kabhi masala-e-ishq
main KHub samajhta hun jo irshad karenge

be-KHud aisa kiya KHauf-e-shab-e-tanhai ne
subah se shama jala di tere saudai ne

gulon se khel rahe hain nasim ke jhonke
qafas mein baiTha hua hath mal raha hun main

puchhne wale bhari bazm mein qatil ko na puchh
nam tera hi agar le liya saudai ne

kuchh abr ko bhi zid hai 'manzar' meri tauba se
jab ahd kiya main ne ghanghor ghaTa chhai

daman-o-jeb-o-gareban ka nahin koi malal
gham ye hai dast-e-junun kal ke liye kaam nahin

wo aur honge jin ko hai fikr-e-ziyan-o-sud
duniya se be-niyaz hai meri ghazal ka rang

ek ashk-e-nadamat se dhul jate sabhi isyan
ek ashk-e-nadamat tak pahuncha hi nahin koi

jo log aa rahe hain tumhaare qarib-tar
muD kar wo su-e-sham-o-sahar dekhte nahin

har shai se ho ke kyon na rahe be-niyaz wo
har shai jahan mein jis ko tamasha dikhai de

nazar karta nahin nashsha-labon par
ki jis ke hath paimane lage hain

jo kah rahe the KHun se sinchenge gulsitan
wo hamiyan-e-fasl-e-bahaaran kidhar gae

mazaq-e-KHud-parasti ek kamzori hai insan ki
bayan kar ke haqiqat ye uThaya hai ziyan hum ne

chand ke husn ki taswir banane wale
mere mahbub ka chehra nahin dekha tu ne

nikla zaban se jhuT jo sach ke libas mein
baDh ke sabhi ne hum ko gale se laga liya

til nahin mang mein zanaKHi ke
ye kanhayya khaDa hai gokul mein

qatl amir-e-shahr ka laDla beTa kar gaya
jurm magar gharib ke laKHt-e-jigar ke sar gaya

daman se wo ponchhta hai aansu
rone ka kuchh aaj hi maza hai

dekhiye hoga shri-krishn ka darshan kyun-kar
sina-e-tang mein dil gopiyon ka hai bekal

suna hai mohtasib bhi tak mein hai duKHtar-e-raz ki
ilahi rakh le tu hurmat sharab-e-arghawani ki

rakhiyan le ke silonon ki barahman niklen
tar barish ka to TuTe koi saat koi pal

yaadgar-e-zamana hain hum log
sun rakho tum fasana hain hum log

kah raha hai shor-e-dariya se samundar ka sukut
jis ka jitna zarf hai utna hi wo KHamosh hai

ai shama tujh pe raat ye bhaari hai jis tarah
main ne tamam umr guzari hai is tarah

mar mar ke agar sham to ro ro ke sahar ki
yun zindagi hum ne teri duri mein basar ki

ibtida se aaj tak 'natiq' ki ye hai sarguzisht
pahle chup tha phir hua diwana ab behosh hai

dil hai kis ka jis mein arman aap ka rahta nahin
farq itna hai ki sab kahte hain main kahta nahin

aazadiyon ka haq na ada hum se ho saka
anjam ye hua ki giraftar ho gae

dil rahe ya na rahe zaKHm bhare ya na bhare
chaarasazon ki KHushamad mujhe manzur nahin

mai-kasho mai ki kami beshi pe nahaq josh hai
ye to saqi jaanta hai kis ko kitna hosh hai

ek dagh-e-dil ne mujh ko diye be-shumar dagh
paida hue hazar charagh is charagh se

do aalam se guzar ke bhi dil-e-ashiq hai aawara
abhi tak ye musafir apni manzil par nahin aaya

un ke lab par zikr aaya be-hijabana mera
manzil-e-takmil tak pahuncha ab afsana mera

mohabbat-ashna dil mazhab-o-millat ko kya jaane
hui raushan jahan bhi shama parwana wahin aaya

meri jaanib se un ke dil mein kis shikwe pe kina hai
wo shikwa jo zaban par kya abhi dil mein nahin aaya

sadqe tere hote hain suraj bhi sitare bhi
hum kis se kahen dil hai sine mein hamare bhi

agar baKHshe zahe qismat na baKHshe to shikayat kya
sar-e-taslim KHam hai jo mizaj-e-yar mein aae

kitne mah-o-anjum hain ziya-pash azal se
lekin na hui kam dil-e-insan ki siyahi

jahan gulshan wahan gul hai jahan gul hai wahan bu hai
jahan ulfat wahan main hun jahan main hun wahan tu hai

afsurda-dil ke waste kya chandni ka lutf
lipTa paDa hai murda sa goya kafan ke sath

dekhna ghafil na rahna chashm-e-tar se dekhna
aaina jab dekhna meri nazar se dekhna

zindagi kahte hain kis ko maut kis ka nam hai
mehrbani aap ki na-meharbani aap ki

hans hans ke kah raha hai jalana sawab hai
zalim ye mera dil hai charagh-e-haram nahin

tum ne ehsan kiya hai ki namak chhiDka hai
ab mujhe zaKHm-e-jigar aur maza dete hain

hamari zindagi-o-maut ki ho tum raunaq
charagh-e-bazm bhi ho aur charagh-e-fan bhi ho

donon aankhen dil jigar hain ishq hone mein sharik
ye to sab achchhe rahenge mujh par ilzam aaega

dekhiye lazim-o-malzum ise kahte hain
dil hai daghon ke liye dagh mere dal ke liye

hua hai saKHt mushkil dafan hona tere wahshi ka
jahan par qabr khodi jati hai patthar nikalte hain

gae the hazrat-e-zahid to zard tha chehra
sharab-KHane se nikle to surKH-ru nikle

intizar aap ka aisa hai ki dam kahta hai
nigah-e-shauq hun aankhon se nikal jaunga

ai gul-andam ye hai fasl-e-jawani ka uruj
husn ka rang Tapakne ko hai ruKHsaron se

apni wahshat se hai shikwa dusre se kya gila
hum se jab baiTha na jae ku-e-jaanan kya kare

dil hai shauq-e-wasl mein muztar nazar mushtaq-e-did
jo hai mashghul apni apni sai-e-la-hasil mein hai

nahin hai jis mein tera ishq wo dil hai tabahi mein
wo kashti Dub jaegi na jis mein na-KHuda hoga

buton ke dil mein hamari kuchh ab hui hai jagah
KHuda ne rahm kiya warna mar gae hote

qaid ki muddat baDhi chhuTne ki jab tadbir ki
rose badli jati hain kaDiyan meri zanjir ki

sabhon ki aa gai piri jo tum jawan hue
zamin ka dil hua miTTi KHam aasman hue

siye jate hain kafan aap ke diwanon ke
tar daman ke hain TukDe hain garebanon ke

mashuq kaun sa hai na ho dil mein jis ki yaad
is muKHtasar se bagh mein kis gul ki bu nahin

ras aae tum ko mulk-e-ishq ki aab-o-hawa
aashiqo har-waqt shaghl-e-ah-o-zari chahiye

kabhi madfun hue the jis jagah par kushta-e-abru
abhi tak is zamin se saikDon KHanjar nikalte hain

saza har ek ko dene lagi haya un ki
ki chaak ho gai lipTi jahan qaba in ki

wo gesu baDhte jate hain balaen hoti hain nazil
qadam tak aa gae jab hashr aalam mein bapa hoga

hamesha be-dili ki kijiye kyunkar na dildari
na hona pas dil ka hai nishani ek dilbar ki

KHuda jaane ye gardish ka tariqa kab nikala hai
jise kahte hain gardun ek mere panw ka chhaala hai

jo meri chashm ke parde sharik ho jate
kamal-e-daman-e-abr-e-bahaar baDh jata

ghar to kya ghar ka nishan bhi nahin baqi 'safdar'
ab watan mein kabhi jaenge to mehman honge

ek nigah-e-ghalat-andaz sahi
dil ki aaKHir koi qimat hogi

qismaton se mila hai dard hamein
kahin aaram-e-dil na ho jae

qimat-e-jins-e-wafa nim-nigahi tauba
aisi baaten na karen aap ki sauda na bane

jaur-e-aflak ki shirkat ki zarurat kya hai
aap kafi hain zamane ko satane ke liye

zara wo KHak mein milne na de KHun-e-shahidan ko
KHuda taufiq de itni zamin-e-ku-e-jaanan ko

shor macha deti hai us ki KHamoshi
bole to phir sannaTa chha jata hai

KHizr se kah do ki aa kar dekh len aab-e-hayat
dhoe jate hain nichoDe jaenge gesu-e-dost

dil ka kanwal bujhe hue muddat guzar gai
ab ye charagh laeq-e-mahfil nahin raha

visal-e-yar se duna hua ishq
maraz baDhta gaya jun jun dawa ki

na taDapne ki ijazat hai na fariyaad ki hai
ghuT ke mar jaun ye marzi mere sayyaad ki hai

jawani se ziyaada waqt-e-piri josh hota hai
bhaDakta hai charagh-e-subh jab KHamosh hota hai

ishq-e-mizhgan mein hazaron ne gale kaTwae
id-e-qurban mein jo wo le ke chhuri baiTh gaya

hum na bigDenge agar chasm-numai hogi
phir kahin aankh laDai to laDai hogi

wo naha kar zulf-e-pechan ko jo bikhrane lage
husn ke dariya mein pinhan sanp lahrane lage

KHuda ka Dar na hota gar bashar ko
KHuda jaane ye banda kya na karta

wasl mein bekar hai munh par naqab
sharam ka aankhon pe parda chahiye

chashm-poshon se rahun 'shad' main kya aaina-dar
munh pe kana nahin kahta hai koi kane ko

mushkil mein kab kisi ka koi aashna hua
talwar jab gale se mili sar juda hua

sohbat-e-wasl hai masdud hain dar hae hijab
nahin malum ye kis aah se sharam aati hai

jab jite-ji na puchha puchhenge kya mare par
murde ki ruh ko bhi ghar se nikalte hain

pani pani ho KHajalat se har ek chashm-e-habab
jo muqabil ho meri ashk bhari aankhon se

nishan-e-'mir' hai hum se jo hum miTe ai 'shad'
ye jaan reKHta-goi gai zamane se

rone se ek pal nahin mohlat firaq mein
ye aankh kya lagi mere pichhe bala lagi

is se behtar aur kah lenge agar zinda hain 'shad'
kho gaya pahla jo wo diwan kya tha kuchh na tha

laga ke ThaT hai har suna muradi
tamanna-e-dili nikle kidhar se

har ek jawahar besh-baha chamka to ye patthar kahne laga
jo sang tera wo sang mera tu aur nahin main aur nahin

meri be-rishta-dili se use maza mil jae
jigar kabab jo koi jala-bhuna mil jae

puchha jo shabab-e-bashari chashm-e-fana se
palkon ne sada di ki bharosa nahin pal ka

chashm-e-tar ne baha ke ju-e-sarishk
mauj-e-dariya ko dhaar par mara

wo mere pas se guzre to ye malum hua
zindagi yun bhi dabe panw guzar jati hai

gul toD liya shaKH se ye kah ke KHizan ne
ye ek tabassum ka gunahgar hua hai

itra ke aaina mein chiDhate the apna munh
dekha mujhe to jhenp gae munh chhupa liya

masala kasrat mein wahdat ka hua hal tum se KHub
ek hi jhuT aur tumhaare lakh iqraron mein hai

ye dil ki baat hi munh se ada nahin hoti
main kya kahun ki yahan bar bar kyun aaya

junun ko wo banawaT samajh raha hai abhi
ye sun liya hai kisi se ki mere ghar bhi hai

yazid morcha jita tha jang haara tha
ye sach ragon mein mere inqalab bharta hai

naKHuda maujon ki is narm-KHirami pe na ja
yahi maujen to badal jati hain tufanon mein

numud-e-subh se shab ki wo tirgi to gai
ye aur baat ki suraj mein raushni kam hai

kya kahen bazm mein kuchh aisi jagah baiThe hain
jam-e-mai hadsa ban jae to hum tak pahunche

allah allah ye hangama-e-paikar-e-hayat
ab wo aawaz bhi dete hain to sunte nahin hum

hukm-e-lab-bandi farogh-e-dastan banta gaya
zaKHm ko jitna dabaya KHun-chakan banta gaya

duniya hamein fareb pe deti rahi fareb
hum dekhte rahe nigah-e-e'tibar se

hamein bhi ghuncha-o-gul se baDi mohabbat thi
chaman mein kash hamara bhi aashiyan hota

koi is fasl mein diwana hua hai shayad
ki hawa hath mein zanjir liye phirti hai

kam hui bang-e-jaras bhi ya-rab
hum se wamanda kidhar jaenge

kaun paband-e-junun fasl-e-bahaaran mein na tha
is baras nang-e-jawani tha jo zindan mein na tha

saqi kuchh aaj tujh ko KHabar hai basant ki
har su bahaar pesh-e-nazar hai basant ki

samjhe na wo hamein na unhen hum samajh sake
guzri hai umr jaise kisi ajnabi ke sath

mahsur KHud hain apne suron ko liye khaDe
dahshat si chha gai hai sitam ki sipah mein

kaha main ne ki jannat par raza-e-dost faiq hai
raza-e-dost boli be-KHabar main hi to jannat hun
